remedies of the seller or lender under such agreement in the event of default are limited solely to repossession or sale of such property);</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;All obligations of such Entity as lessee under or with respect Capital Leases;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;All non-contingent payment or reimbursement obligations of such Entity under or with respect to all letters of credit (including standby and commercial), banker's
acceptances, bank guaranties, shipside bonds, surety bonds and similar instruments (hereinafter "Surety Instruments");</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;All net obligations of such Entity, contingent or otherwise, under or with respect to Rate Contracts;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(g)&nbsp;All Guaranty Obligations of such Entity with respect to the obligations of other Entities of the types described in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>clauses&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;- (f) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>above and all other Contingent Obligations of such Entity; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(h)&nbsp;All obligations of other Entities of the types described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clauses&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;- (f) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>above to the extent
secured by (or for which any holder of such obligations has an existing right, contingent or otherwise, to be secured by) any lien in any property (including accounts and contract rights) of such
Entity, even though such Entity has not assumed or become liable for the payment of such obligations.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Insurance and Condemnation Payments.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Insurance and Condemnation Payments" shall mean the
portion of all compensation attributable to the Parcels and awarded or paid upon any Taking, as described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;16.4 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease, and paid
to Landlord pursuant to the Distribution Formula set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;16.4 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>the
portion of all proceeds of insurance paid to Landlord pursuant to the Distribution Formula set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;16.4 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease, as described
in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;17.3 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Interest Expenses.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Interest Expenses" shall mean, with respect to any Entity for any period,
the sum, determined on a consolidated basis in accordance with GAAP, of (a)&nbsp;all interest on the Indebtedness of such Entity paid or accrued during such period (including interest attributable
to Capital Leases) plus (b)&nbsp;all fees in respect of outstanding letters of credit paid or accrued by such Entity during such period.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Investment.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Investment" of any Entity shall mean any loan or advance of funds by such Entity
to any other Entity (other than advances to employees of such Entity for moving and travel expenses, drawing accounts and similar expenditures in the ordinary course of business), any purchase or
other acquisition of any Equity Securities or Indebtedness of any other Entity, any capital contribution by such Entity to or any other investment by such Entity in any other Entity (including any
Guaranty Obligations of such Entity and any indebtedness of such Entity of the type described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(h) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the definition of "Indebtedness"
on behalf of any other Entity); </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided, however, </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>that Investments shall not include (a)&nbsp;accounts receivable or other indebtedness owed by
customers of such Entity which are current assets and arose from sales of inventory in the ordinary course of such Entity's business, (b)&nbsp;prepaid expenses of such Entity incurred and prepaid in
the ordinary course of business, or (c)&nbsp;acquisitions of Equity Securities subject to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;21.21(e) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Invoice.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Invoice" shall have the meaning set forth in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;7.1 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IRC.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"IRC" shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Land.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Land" shall have the meaning set forth in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;1.5</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of the Lease.
<!-- SEQ.=7,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=blank,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KH2301B.;2',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:58' -->
</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Landlord.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Landlord" shall mean Sumitomo Bank Leasing and Finance,&nbsp;Inc. and its
successors and permitted assigns.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Landlord Affiliate.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Landlord Affiliate" shall mean any entity which controls, is controlled by
or is under the common control of Landlord.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Landlord's Additional Rent Interest.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Landlord's Additional Rent Interest" shall mean the
respective amount owed to Landlord for Additional Rent, excluding the Purchase Price, the Guaranteed Residual Value, the Termination Amount, Insurance and Condemnation Payments and Default Amounts,
but including, without limitation, any Break Funding Costs, Additional Charges and Additional Amounts payable pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.4 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the
Lease, claims for indemnification amounts payable by Tenant under the Operative Documents, and all other fees, costs and expenses payable or reimbursable by Tenant under the Operative Documents.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Landlord's Base Rent Interest.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Landlord's Base Rent Interest" shall mean the sum of
(a)&nbsp;the portion of each payment of Base Rent attributable to the Landlord Contribution calculated in accordance with </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(b) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the
definition of "Base Rent;" </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> (b)&nbsp;the same portion of each payment of interest paid by Tenant at the Default Rate on Base Rent.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Landlord Contribution.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Landlord Contribution," at the time of the relevant calculation, shall
mean Ten Million Seven Hundred and Forty Thousand and No/100 Dollars ($10,740,000.00), less all amounts applied to reduce the Lease Investment Balance which are distributed to Landlord in accordance
with the Rent Purchase Agreement.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Landlord Contribution Rate.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;From the Date of Lease to August&nbsp;15, 2003, the "Landlord
Contribution Rate" shall be equal to a fixed rate of seven and one-hundredths of one percent (7.01%), plus the applicable margin set forth in the Pricing Grid; and (b)&nbsp;from and after
August&nbsp;15, 2003, the Landlord Contribution Rate for any Rental Period and Portion applicable to the Landlord Contribution, shall be equal to the per annum rate equal to the sum of the LIBOR
Rate for such Rental Period or Portion plus the applicable margin set forth in the Pricing Grid, such rate to change from time to time during such period as the applicable margin shall change.
Notwithstanding the foregoing:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;If, on or before the first day of any Rental Period for any Portion, (i)&nbsp;Landlord shall determine that the LIBOR Rate for such Rental Period cannot be
adequately and reasonably determined due to the unavailability of funds in or other circumstances affecting the London interbank market or (ii)&nbsp;Landlord determines that the rate of interest for
such Portion does not adequately and fairly reflect the cost to Landlord of funding its share of such Portion, Landlord shall immediately give notice of such condition to Tenant. After the giving of
any such notice by Landlord and until Landlord shall otherwise notify Tenant that the circumstances giving rise to such condition no longer exist, the Landlord Contribution Rate for each new Rental
Period shall be the Base Rate.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;If, after the date of the Lease, the adoption of any Governmental Rule, or any change in any Governmental Rule&nbsp;or the application or requirements thereof
(whether such change occurs in accordance with the terms of such Governmental Rule&nbsp;as enacted, as a result of amendment or otherwise) or any change in the interpretation or administration of
any Governmental Rule&nbsp;by any Governmental Authority, or compliance by Landlord with any request or directive (whether or not having the force of law) of any Governmental Authority (a
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Change of Law</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), shall make it unlawful or impossible for Landlord to make or maintain any part of the Lease Investment Balance at the LIBOR Rate,
Landlord shall immediately notify Tenant of such Governmental Rule&nbsp;or Change of Law. After the giving of any such notice by Landlord and until Landlord shall otherwise notify Tenant that such
Change of Law or Governmental Rule&nbsp;is no longer in effect with respect to Landlord, the Landlord Contribution Rate for each new Rental Period shall be the Base Rate.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;If a Default has occurred and is continuing at the time the Notice of Rental Period Selection is required to be delivered in accordance with</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;7.1(b) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease, the Landlord Contribution Rate for each new Rental Period shall be the Base Rate until such Default has been cured
or waived.

be equal to&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;% of the Guaranteed Residual Value.</FONT></P>

much of the Insurance and Condemnation Payments that does not exceed the sum of Landlord's Percentage of the Insurance and Condemnation Payments.</FONT></P>

Landlord's Guaranteed Residual Value Interest and the Landlord's Termination Option Interest.</FONT></P>

payable by Tenant under </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;20.1 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease that exceeds the Rent Purchasers' Purchase Price Interest.</FONT></P>

or reduction of the amounts placed at risk by or through the Landlord, excluding for purposes of this clause

part thereof, as applicable.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;LIBOR Rate.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"LIBOR Rate" shall mean, with respect to each Rental Period, a rate per annum equal
to the quotient (rounded upward if necessary to the nearest 1/100 of one percent) of:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;As elected by Tenant, either:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;The arithmetic mean (rounded upward if necessary to the nearest 1/16 of one percent) of the rates per annum appearing on Telerate Page&nbsp;3750 (or any
successor publication) on the second Business Day prior to the first day of such Rental Period at or about 11:00&nbsp;A.M. (London time) (for delivery on the first day of such Rental Period) for a
term comparable to such Rental Period (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); or</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;The arithmetic mean (rounded upward if necessary to the nearest 1/16 of one percent) of the rates per annum at which Dollar deposits are offered to each of ABN
AMRO Bank N.V., Bank of Montreal and The First National Bank of Chicago (the "Reference Banks") in the London interbank market on the second Business Day prior to the first day of such Rental Period
at or about 11:00&nbsp;A.M. (London time) (for delivery on the first day of such Rental Period) in an amount substantially equal to such Reference Bank's proportionate share of such Portion and for
a term comparable to such Rental Period (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Reference Bank Rate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>");</FONT></P>
</UL>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>divided by</I></FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;One minus the Reserve Requirement for such Portion in effect from time to time.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If, for any reason, any Reference Banks do not provide Landlord and Administrative Agent with rates pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(a)(ii)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>
after Tenant elects the Reference Bank Rate to determine the LIBOR Rate for any Rental Period, Administrative Agent shall calculate the Reference Bank Rate for such Rental Period based upon the rate
or rates provided by the other Reference Banks or Reference Bank; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided, however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that, if no Reference Bank provides Administrative Agent with such
a rate, Administrative Agent shall determine the LIBOR Rate for such Rental Period based upon the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate. If, for any reason, the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate is not available after
Tenant elects the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate to determine the LIBOR Rate for any Rental Period, Administrative Agent shall determine the LIBOR Rate for such Rental Period based upon the Reference Bank
Rate. The LIBOR Rate shall be adjusted automatically as to all outstanding Portions then calculated on the basis of the LIBOR Rate as of the effective date of any change in the Reserve Requirement.

</FONT></P>

Lease or other title retention agreement, or any agreement to provide any of the foregoing, and the filing of any financing statement or similar instrument under the Uniform Commercial Code or
comparable law of any jurisdiction other than filings made for notice purposes only in connection with true leases (which would not include "synthetic" leases).</FONT></P>

Purchaser that is in default under the terms of the Rent Purchase Agreement or the Participation Agreement.</FONT></P>

with the terms of the Lease and the other Operative Documents; or (c)&nbsp;practical realization of the material rights and remedies of Landlord, Administrative Agent or any Rent Purchaser intended
to be provided under the Operative Documents.</FONT></P>

the immediately preceding fiscal year equal to or greater than five percent (5%) of the consolidated gross revenues of Tenant and its Subsidiaries during such year.</FONT></P>

period, the remainder, calculated on a consolidated basis, of (a) the aggregate consideration paid by Tenant and its Subsidiaries during such period (including Indebtedness incurred) to purchase,
redeem, retire, defease or otherwise acquire Equity Securities of Tenant and its Subsidiaries minus (b)&nbsp;the aggregate consideration received by Tenant and its Subsidiaries during such period
for Equity Securities issued by Borrower and its Subsidiaries net of the actual amount of the reasonable fees and commissions paid to Entities other than Tenant or its Affiliates, the reasonable legal
expenses and the other reasonable costs and
expenses directly related to such issuance of Equity Securities that are paid by Tenant and its Subsidiaries; provided, that (i)&nbsp;capital stock of Tenant and its Subsidiaries issued in exchange
for other capital stock of Tenant and its Subsidiaries as permitted by </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;21.21(f)(i) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease shall be excluded for purposes of
calculating clauses&nbsp;(a) and (b) above, (ii)&nbsp;repurchases of capital stock from employees of Tenant or its Subsidiaries as permitted by</FONT>

above.</FONT></P>

time, determined on a consolidated basis in accordance with GAAP, of (a)&nbsp;the total assets of Tenant and its Subsidiaries at such time, minus (b)&nbsp;the sum (without limitation and without
duplication of deductions) of the total liabilities of Tenant and its Subsidiaries at such time and all reserves of Tenant and its Subsidiaries at such time for anticipated losses and expenses (to the

Landlord's Taxes as defined in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.1 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease) not yet due and payable; (d)&nbsp;the Security Instruments; (e)&nbsp;all title
defects, liens, encumbrances, deeds of trust, mortgages, rights-of-way, and restrictive covenants and conditions affecting the Land except to the extent any of the foregoing arise as a result of
Landlord's actions or with Landlord's written consent (unless such actions taken or consent given by Landlord are requested in writing by Tenant); and (f)&nbsp;the Lease and all Lease Supplements.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Present Value.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Present Value" shall have the meaning set forth in</FONT>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Portion.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Portion" shall mean a portion of the Lease Investment Balance for which a Landlord
Contribution Rate or a Rent Purchasers Contribution Rate is determined.</FONT></P>

Payments and Default Amounts, but including, without limitation, any Break Funding Costs, Additional Charges and Additional Amounts payable pursuant to</FONT>

expenses payable or reimbursable by Tenant under the Operative Documents.</FONT></P>

of the definition of "Base Rent;" </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(b) the same portion of each payment of interest paid by Tenant at the Default Rate on Base Rent.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Rent Purchaser's Commitment.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Rent Purchaser's Commitment" shall mean the commitment of any

Participation Agreement.

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Rent Purchasers Contribution.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Rent Purchasers Contribution," at the time of the relevant
calculation, shall mean the Lease Investment Balance as of the date of such calculation, less the Landlord Contribution as of such date.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Rent Purchasers Contribution Rate.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Rent Purchasers Contribution Rate" shall mean, for any
Rental Period and Portion applicable to the Rent Purchasers Contribution, the per annum rate equal to the sum of the LIBOR Rate for such Rental Period and Portion plus the applicable margin set forth
in the Pricing Grid, such rate to change from time to time during such period as the applicable margin shall change. Notwithstanding the foregoing:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;If, on or before the first day of any Rental Period for any Portion, (i)&nbsp;any Rent Purchaser shall advise Administrative Agent that the LIBOR Rate for such
Rental Period cannot be adequately and reasonably determined due to the unavailability of funds in or other circumstances affecting the London interbank market or (ii)&nbsp;Majority Rent Purchasers
shall advise Administrative Agent that the rate of interest for such Portion does not adequately and fairly reflect the cost to such Rent Purchasers of funding their respective share of such Portion,
Administrative Agent shall immediately give notice of
such condition to Tenant and the other Rent Purchasers. After the giving of any such notice by Administrative Agent and until Administrative Agent shall otherwise notify Tenant that the circumstances
giving rise to such condition no longer exist, the Rent Purchasers Contribution Rate for each new Rental Period shall be the Base Rate.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;If, after the date of the Lease, the adoption of any Governmental Rule&nbsp;or any Change of Law shall make it unlawful or impossible for any Rent Purchaser to
make or maintain any part of the Lease Investment Balance at the LIBOR Rate, such Rent Purchaser shall immediately notify Administrative Agent and Tenant of such Governmental Rule&nbsp;or Change of
Law. After the giving of any such notice by any Rent Purchaser and until Administrative Agent shall otherwise notify Tenant that such Governmental Rule&nbsp;or Change of Law is no longer in effect
with respect to any Rent Purchaser, the Rent Purchasers Contribution Rate for each new Rental Period shall be the Base Rate.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;If a Default has occurred and is continuing at the time the Notice of Rental Period Selection is required to be delivered in accordance with</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;7.1(b) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Lease, the Rent Purchasers Contribution Rate for each new Rental Period shall be the Base Rate until such Default has been
cured or waived.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Rent Purchasers' Deed of Trust.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Rent Purchasers' Deed of Trust" shall mean those certain Deeds
of Trust granted by Landlord in favor of Administrative Agent to secure Landlord's obligations to Administrative Agent and the Rent Purchasers pursuant to the Operative Documents.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Rent Purchasers' Default Interest.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Rent Purchasers' Default Interest" shall mean the right of
the Rent Purchasers to receive, in the order of priority set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;3.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of the Rent Purchase Agreement, so much of the Default Amounts
that does not exceed the Rent Purchasers' Purchase Price Interest.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Rent Purchasers' Guaranteed Residual Value Interest.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Rent Purchasers' Guaranteed Residual
Value Interest" shall mean the right of the Rent Purchasers to receive and retain, in the order of priority set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;3.2 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Rent
Purchase Agreement, so much of any payment of Guaranteed Residual Value that does not exceed the sum of (a)&nbsp;Rent Purchasers' Percentage of the Lease Investment Balance, plus (b)&nbsp;the same
portion of each payment of interest paid by Tenant at the Default Rate on such payment of Guaranteed Residual Value.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Rent Purchasers' Insurance and Condemnation Interest.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;"Rent Purchasers' Insurance and
Condemnation Interest" shall mean the right of the Rent Purchasers to receive, in the order of priority set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;3.2 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the Rent
Purchase Agreement, so much of the Insurance and Condemnation Payments that does not exceed the sum of Rent Purchasers' Percentage of the Insurance and Condemnation Payments.</FONT></P>

the Rent Purchasers' Base Rent Interest, the Rent Purchasers' Additional Rent Interest, the Rent Purchasers' Default Interest, the Rent Purchasers' Insurance and Condemnation Interest, the Rent
Purchasers'

Purchase Price Interest, the Rent Purchasers' Guaranteed Residual Value Interest and the Rent Purchasers' Termination Option Interest with respect to such Parcel.</FONT></P>

the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System) maintained by a member bank of the Federal Reserve System. As used herein, the term "reserve requirement" shall include, without limitation, any

of 30 days each. The 30/360 Basis shall only apply to the calculation of that portion of the Base Rent attributable to the Landlord Contribution during the period that the Landlord Contribution Rate
is based upon a fixed rate of 7.01%. That portion representing the applicable margin referenced in the Pricing Grid which is added to the fixed rate of 7.01% shall be calculated using an Actual/360
Basis; after August&nbsp;15, 2003, the Landlord Contribution portion of any amount shall be calculated using an Actual/360 Basis. All other monthly calculations shall be made using an Actual/360
Basis.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>II.&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>RULES OF CONSTRUCTION</I></B></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All personal pronouns used in the Operative Documents shall include all other genders. The singular shall include the plural and the plural shall include the singular. Titles of
Articles, Sections and Subsections in the Operative Documents are for convenience only and neither limit nor amplify the provisions of the Operative Documents, and all references in any Operative
Document to Articles, Sections or Subsections shall refer to the corresponding Article, Section or Subsection of such Operative Documents unless specific reference is made to the articles, sections or
other subdivisions of another document or instrument. Unless otherwise specified in any Operative Document, all accounting terms used in the Operative Documents shall be interpreted, all accounting
determinations under the Operative Documents shall be made, and all Financial Statements required to be delivered under the Operative Documents shall be prepared in accordance with GAAP, applied on a
basis consistent with the most recent audited consolidated Financial Statements of the Tenant and its Subsidiaries delivered to Landlord or Administrative Agent.</FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><I>FIRST AMENDMENT TO<BR>
DEED OF TRUST, FINANCING STATEMENT, SECURITY AGREEMENT<BR>
AND FIXTURE FILING (WITH ASSIGNMENT OF RENTS AND LEASES)</I></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS FIRST AMENDMENT TO DEED OF TRUST, FINANCING STATEMENT, SECURITY AGREEMENT AND FIXTURE FILING (WITH ASSIGNMENT OF RENTS AND LEASES) (this "Amendment") is
made and entered into as of August&nbsp;11, 1999, by and between SUMITOMO BANK LEASING AND FINANCE, INC., a Delaware corporation ("Beneficiary"), and ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED, a Delaware
corporation ("Trustor").</FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>Recitals:</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with that certain Sublease of the Land and Lease of the Improvements dated August&nbsp;15, 1996, Trustor executed and delivered that certain Deed of
Trust, Financing Statement, Security Agreement and Fixture Filing (with Assignment of Rents and Leases) dated as of August&nbsp;15, 1996, to First American Title Guaranty Company ("Trustee") for the
benefit Beneficiary, recorded August 15, 1996, in Official Records of Santa Clara County, California, as Instrument No. 13410223 (the "Deed of Trust"), under which Deed of Trust Trustor assigned to
Trustee, as security and collateral for the Obligations more particularly described therein, for the benefit of the Beneficiary, all of Trustor's rights, interests, and privileges in and to that
certain real property situated in Santa Clara County, California, and described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> attached hereto.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;Beneficiary and Trustor have agreed to amend the Deed of Trust as set forth below.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants herein contained, the parties hereby agree as follows:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Recitals.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;The recitals set forth above are true and correct and are incorporated herein by this
reference.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Counterparts; Capitalized Terms.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment may be executed in any number of counterparts, each
of which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which together shall comprise but a single instrument. All capitalized terms used but not defined herein shall have the meaning ascribed to such
terms in the Deed of Trust.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Amendments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;The Deed of Trust is hereby amended as follows:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
All references in the Deed of Trust to the "Sublease" shall be amended to refer to the Amended, Restated and Consolidated Master Lease of Land and Improvements ("Lease") being
entered into concurrently herewith by and between Trustor and Beneficiary.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
All references in the Deed of Trust to definitions in the Lease shall be amended to allow for all definitions formerly found in the Lease to be found in Appendix&nbsp;A to the
Lease.
<!-- SEQ.=1,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=1,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KK2301A.;19',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
The second recital of the Deed of Trust shall be amended to reflect an amount of $75,797,872.34, which is to be repaid to Beneficiary pursuant to the terms of the Lease.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
The third recital of the Deed of Trust, in subparagraph&nbsp;(iii), shall be amended in its entirety to refer to "any other obligation or agreement of Trustor under the Operative
Documents, as such documents are defined in the Lease."
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(e)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Sections&nbsp;1.02(b)(2) and 1.02(b)(3) shall be amended to increase the amount of proceeds payable directly to Trustor from $250,000.00 to $2,000,000.00, in accordance with the
Lease.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(f)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Section&nbsp;3.02 shall be amended to delete the reference to Article&nbsp;VII.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(g)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Section&nbsp;3.05(k) shall be amended to delete the reference to Article&nbsp;VII.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(h)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Section&nbsp;5.04 shall be amended to include a new paragraph&nbsp;(c) as follows:
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Copies of all Notices to Trustor or Beneficiary shall be given to Administrative Agent as follows:</FONT>
<BR>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
ABN AMRO Bank N.V.<BR>
Syndications Group<BR>
1325 Avenue of the Americas, 9th Floor<BR>
New York, NY 10019<BR>
Attn: Linda Boardman</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
and to:</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
ABN AMRO Bank, N.V.<BR>
101 California Street, Suite&nbsp;4550<BR>
San Francisco, CA 94111-5812<BR>
Attn: Jamie Dillon</FONT></P>
</DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Representations and Warranties.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Trustor represents and warrants (1)&nbsp;that no Event of Default
exists under the Deed of Trust as of the date hereof; (2) Trustor has the full right and authority to enter into this Amendment and the persons signing this Amendment have full power and authority to
bind Trustor; (3)&nbsp;the Deed of Trust has not been amended except as set forth in this Amendment; and (4)&nbsp;there has been no prior pledge or assignment by Trustor of the Deed of Trust.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Existing Deed of Trust.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Except to the extent specifically amended hereby, all terms and conditions
of the Deed of Trust remain in full force and effect.</FONT></P>

</UL>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Trustor and Beneficiary have executed this Amendment as of the date and year first written above.</FONT></P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Exhibit A</I></B></FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>LEGAL DESCRIPTION (LEASEHOLD INTEREST)</B></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- SEQ.=5,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=5,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KK2301A.;19',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
Prepared By<BR>
&nbsp;&nbsp;and<BR>
When Recorded Return To:</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Sumitomo Bank Leasing and Finance,&nbsp;Inc.<BR>
c/o Graham&nbsp;&amp; James LLP<BR>
One Maritime Plaza, Suite&nbsp;300<BR>
San Francisco, California 94111-3492<BR>
Attention: Gary S. Hand, Esq.</FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><I>SECOND AMENDMENT TO<BR>
DEED OF TRUST, FINANCING STATEMENT, SECURITY AGREEMENT<BR>
AND FIXTURE FILING (WITH ASSIGNMENT OF RENTS AND LEASES)</I></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO DEED OF TRUST, FINANCING STATEMENT, SECURITY AGREEMENT AND FIXTURE FILING (WITH ASSIGNMENT OF RENTS AND LEASES) (this "Amendment") is
made and entered into as of August&nbsp;11, 1999, by and between SUMITOMO BANK LEASING AND FINANCE, INC., a Delaware corporation ("Beneficiary"), and ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED, a Delaware
corporation ("Trustor").</FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>Recitals:</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with that certain Sublease of the Land and Lease of the Improvements dated October&nbsp;12, 1994, Trustor executed and delivered that certain Deed
of Trust, Financing Statement, Security Agreement and Fixture Filing (with Assignment of Rents and Leases) dated as of October&nbsp;12, 1994, to First American Title Guaranty Company ("Trustee") for
the benefit Beneficiary, recorded October 12, 1994, in Official Records of Santa Clara County, California, as Instrument No. 12684590, as amended by that certain First Amendment thereto dated as of
August&nbsp;15, 1996, and recorded August&nbsp;15, 1996, in the Official Records of Santa Clara County, California, as Instrument No.&nbsp;13410225 (as so amended, the "Deed of Trust"), under
which Deed of Trust Trustor assigned to Trustee, as security and collateral for the Obligations more particularly described therein, for the benefit of the Beneficiary, all of Trustor's rights,
interests, and privileges in and to that certain real property situated in Santa Clara County, California, and described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> attached
hereto.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;Beneficiary and Trustor have agreed to amend the Deed of Trust as set forth below.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants herein contained, the parties hereby agree as follows:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Recitals.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;The recitals set forth above are true and correct and are incorporated herein by this
reference.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Counterparts; Capitalized Terms.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment may be executed in any number of counterparts, each
of which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which together shall comprise but a single instrument. All capitalized terms used but not defined herein shall have the meaning ascribed to such
terms in the Deed of Trust.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Amendments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;The Deed of Trust is hereby amended as follows:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
All references in the Deed of Trust to the "Sublease" shall be amended to refer to the Amended, Restated and Consolidated Master Lease of Land and Improvements ("Lease") being
entered into concurrently herewith by and between Trustor and Beneficiary.
<!-- SEQ.=6,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=1,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KK2301B.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
All references in the Deed of Trust to definitions in the Lease shall be amended to allow for all definitions formerly found in the Lease to be found in Appendix&nbsp;A to the
Lease.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
The second recital of the Deed of Trust shall be amended to reflect an amount of $66,702,127.66, which is to be repaid to Beneficiary pursuant to the terms of the Lease.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
The third recital of the Deed of Trust, in subparagraph (iii), shall be amended in its entirety to refer to "any other obligation or agreement of Trustor under the Operative
Documents, as such documents are defined in the Lease."
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(e)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Sections 1.02(b)(2)&nbsp;and 1.02(b)(3)&nbsp;shall be amended to increase the amount of proceeds payable directly to Trustor from $250,000.00 to $2,000,000.00, in accordance
with the Lease.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(f)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Section 3.02 shall be amended to delete the references to Article&nbsp;VII and Section 3.03
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(g)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Section 3.03 shall be deleted in its entirety as the Pledge Agreement is being terminated on even date herewith.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(h)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Section 3.06(k) shall be amended to delete the reference to Article&nbsp;VII.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(i)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Section 5.04 shall be amended to change the notice address for Beneficiary in paragraph (a)&nbsp;and to include a new paragraph&nbsp;(c) as follows:</FONT>
<BR>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Sumitomo Bank Leasing and Finance,&nbsp;Inc.<BR>
277 Park Avenue<BR>
New York, NY 10172<BR>
Attn: Chief Credit Officer</FONT></P>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>
Copies of all Notices to Trustor or Beneficiary shall be given to Administrative Agent as follows:</FONT>
<BR>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
ABN AMRO Bank N.V.<BR>
Syndications Group<BR>
1325 Avenue of the Americas, 9th Floor<BR>
New York, NY 10019<BR>
Attn: Linda Boardman<BR></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
and to:</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
ABN AMRO Bank, N.V.<BR>
101 California Street, Suite&nbsp;4550<BR>
San Francisco, CA 94111-5812<BR>
Attn: Jamie Dillon</FONT></P>
</DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Representations and Warranties.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Trustor represents and warrants (1)&nbsp;that no Event of Default
exists under the Deed of Trust as of the date hereof; (2)&nbsp;Trustor has the full right and authority to enter into this Amendment and the persons signing this Amendment have full power and
authority to bind Trustor; (3)&nbsp;the Deed of Trust has not been amended except as set forth in this Amendment; and (4)&nbsp;there has been no prior pledge or assignment by Trustor of the Deed
of Trust.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Existing Deed of Trust.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Except to the extent specifically amended hereby, all terms and conditions
of the Deed of Trust remain in full force and effect.</FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>
[Signatures begin on next page.]</FONT></P>

</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Trustor and Beneficiary have executed this Amendment as of the date and year first written above.</FONT></P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Exhibit A</I></B></FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>LEGAL DESCRIPTION (LEASEHOLD INTEREST)</B></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- SEQ.=10,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=5,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KK2301B.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->

<TD WIDTH="45%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;<BR>
RECORDING REQUESTED BY, AND<BR>
WHEN RECORDED, RETURN TO:<BR>
&nbsp;<BR>
ABN Amro Bank, N.V.<BR>
c/o Orrick Herrington&nbsp;&amp; Sutcliffe, LLP<BR>
Old Federal Reserve Bank Building<BR>
