</B></FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B><!-- SEQ.=1,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=blank,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KX2301A.;25',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:42' --></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Exhibit B</I></B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Amended Deeds of Trust</B></FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>

[included herewith]

</B></FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B><!-- SEQ.=2,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=blank,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KX2301A.;25',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:42' -->

AMENDMENT NO. 1 TO AMENDED, RESTATED AND CONSOLIDATED<BR>
MASTER LEASE OF LAND AND IMPROVEMENTS

</B></FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS AMENDMENT NO. 1 TO AMENDED, RESTATED AND CONSOLIDATED MASTER LEASE OF LAND AND IMPROVEMENTS (this
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Amendment</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), dated as of October&nbsp;8, 1999, is entered into by and between:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(1)&nbsp;ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED, a Delaware corporation ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Tenant</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); and

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(2)&nbsp;SUMITOMO BANK LEASING AND FINANCE, INC., a Delaware corporation ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Landlord</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>").

</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>RECITALS

</B></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant and Landlord are parties to that certain Amended, Restated and Consolidated Master Lease of Land and Improvements, dated as of August&nbsp;11, 1999 (the
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Lease</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>").

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with the Lease, Landlord entered into a Participation Agreement, dated as of August&nbsp;11, 1999, with Tenant, certain financial institutions from
time to time parties thereto (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Rent Purchasers</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") and ABN AMRO Bank N.V., as agent for the Rent Purchasers (in such capacity,
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Administrative Agent</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), and a Rent Purchase Agreement, dated as of August&nbsp;11, 1999, with the Rent Purchasers and Administrative Agent, pursuant
to which the Rent Purchasers purchased an interest in the Lease from Landlord.

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant has requested that the insurance provisions in the Lease be amended and Landlord is willing so to amend the Lease upon the terms and subject to the
conditions set forth in this Amendment.

</FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER">

<FONT SIZE=2><B>AGREEMENT

</B></FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the above recitals and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and adequacy of which are hereby
acknowledged, Tenant and Landlord hereby agree as follows:

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Definitions, Interpretation.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;All capitalized terms defined above and
elsewhere in this Amendment shall be used herein as so defined. Unless otherwise defined herein, all other capitalized terms used herein


shall have the respective meanings given to those terms </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Appendix A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> to the Lease. The rules&nbsp;of construction set forth in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Appendix A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> to the Lease shall, to the extent not inconsistent with the terms of this Amendment, apply to this Amendment and are hereby incorporated by
reference.

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Amendments to Lease.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the satisfaction of the conditions set forth
in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 5</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> below, the Lease is hereby amended as follows:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Clause (b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section 9.3</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> is amended to read in its entirety as
follows:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
(b)&nbsp;on and after September&nbsp;15, 1999, earthquake coverage for the Improvements (excluding any Tenant's Property) in an amount not less than $10,000,000, with a deductible not more than
five percent (5%) of than the total value of the Improvements insured; and

</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;The fifth sentence of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section 9.4</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> is amended to read in its entirety as follows:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
The certificates shall state that such insurance is in full force and effect and that coverage will not be reduced below the amounts required under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Article
IX</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> or otherwise limited or canceled without ten (10)&nbsp;days' prior written notice to Landlord and Administrative Agent in the case of any cancellation for non-payment of
premiums and thirty (30) days' prior written notice to Landlord and Administrative Agent in the case of any reduction, limitation or cancellation for any other reason.

</FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Waiver.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the satisfaction of the conditions set forth in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 5</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> below, Landlord hereby waives any Event of Default arising out of Tenant's failure to provide earthquake insurance with a deductible of not
more than $1,000,000 or a certificate of insurance stating that coverage will not be canceled without thirty (30) days' prior written notice.
<!-- SEQ.=3,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=blank,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KX2301A.;25',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:42' -->

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Representations and Warranties.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant hereby represents and warrants to
Landlord, the Rent Purchasers and Administrative Agent that the following are true and correct on the date of this Amendment and that, after giving effect to the amendments set forth in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> above, the following will be true and correct on the Effective Date (as defined below):

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The representations and warranties of Tenant set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section 21.18</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of the Lease and in the other Operative
Documents are true and correct in all material respects as if made on such date (except for representations and warranties expressly made as of a specified date, which shall be true as of such date);

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;No Default has occurred and is continuing; and

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;All of the Operative Documents are in full force and effect.

</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
(Without limiting the scope of the term "Operative Documents," Tenant expressly acknowledges in making the representations and warranties set forth in this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph
4</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> that, on and after the date hereof, such term includes this Amendment.)

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective Date.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;The amendments effected by </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph
2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> above and the waiver effected by </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 3</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> above shall become effective on the date (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Effective
Date</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") that Landlord and Administrative Agent receive each of the following, each in form and substance satisfactory to Landlord and Administrative Agent and their respective
counsel:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The Consent to Amendment duly executed by Majority Rent Purchasers;

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;This Amendment duly executed by Tenant and Landlord;

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;All fees and expenses payable to Landlord, the Rent Purchasers and Administrative Agent on or prior to the Effective Date;

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;All fees and expenses of Landlord's and Administrative Agent's counsels through the Effective Date, to the extent set forth in statements of such counsels delivered
to Lessee on or before the Effective Date; and

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;Such other evidence as Landlord or Administrative Agent may reasonably request to establish the accuracy and completeness in all material respects of the
representations and warranties and the compliance with the terms and conditions contained in this Amendment and the other Operative Documents.

</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Effect of this Amendment.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;On and after the Effective Date, each reference in
the Lease and the other Operative Documents to the Lease shall mean the Lease as amended hereby. Except as specifically amended above, (a)&nbsp;the Lease and the other Operative Documents shall
remain in full force and effect and are hereby ratified and affirmed and (b)&nbsp;the execution, delivery and effectiveness of this Amendment shall not, except as expressly provided herein, operate
as a waiver of any right, power, or remedy of Landlord, the Rent Purchasers or Administrative Agent, nor constitute a waiver of any provision of the Lease or any other Operative Document.

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Miscellaneous.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Counterparts.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> This Amendment may be executed in any number of identical counterparts, any set of which signed by all
the parties hereto shall be deemed to constitute a complete, executed original for all purposes.

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Headings.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> Headings in this Amendment are for convenience of reference only and are not part of the substance hereof.

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Governing Law.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> This Amendment shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of
California without reference to conflicts of law rules.

</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- SEQ.=9,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=blank,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KX2301A.;25',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:42' -->

</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><B>EXHIBIT A

</B></FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>

AMENDMENT NO. 1 TO AMENDED, RESTATED AND CONSOLIDATED<BR>
MASTER LEASE OF LAND AND IMPROVEMENTS

</B></FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS AMENDMENT NO. 1 TO AMENDED, RESTATED AND CONSOLIDATED MASTER LEASE OF LAND AND IMPROVEMENTS (this
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Amendment</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), dated as of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 1999, is entered into by and between:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(1)&nbsp;ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED, a Delaware corporation ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Tenant</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); and

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(2)&nbsp;SUMITOMO BANK LEASING AND FINANCE, INC., a Delaware corporation ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Landlord</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>").

</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>RECITALS

</B></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant and Landlord are parties to that certain Amended, Restated and Consolidated Master Lease of Land and Improvements, dated as of August&nbsp;11, 1999 (the
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Lease</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>").

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with the Lease, Landlord entered into a Participation Agreement, dated as of August&nbsp;11, 1999, with Tenant, certain financial institutions from
time to time parties thereto (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Rent Purchasers</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") and ABN AMRO Bank N.V., as agent for the Rent Purchasers (in such capacity,
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Administrative Agent</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), and a Rent Purchase Agreement, dated as of August&nbsp;11, 1999, with the Rent Purchasers and Administrative Agent, pursuant
to which the Rent Purchasers purchased an interest in the Lease from Landlord.

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant has requested that the insurance provisions in the Lease be amended and Landlord is willing so to amend the Lease upon the terms and subject to the
conditions set forth in this Amendment.

</FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER">

<FONT SIZE=2><B>AGREEMENT

</B></FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the above recitals and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and adequacy of which are hereby
acknowledged, Tenant and Landlord hereby agree as follows:

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Definitions, Interpretation.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;All capitalized terms defined above and
elsewhere in this Amendment shall be used herein as so defined. Unless otherwise defined herein, all other capitalized terms used herein shall have the respective meanings given to those terms</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Appendix A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> to the Lease. The rules&nbsp;of construction set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Appendix A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> to the Lease shall, to
the extent not inconsistent with the terms of this Amendment, apply to this Amendment and are hereby incorporated by reference.

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Amendments to Lease.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the satisfaction of the conditions set forth
in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 5</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> below, the Lease is hereby amended as follows:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Clause (b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section 9.3</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> is amended to read in its entirety as
follows:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
(b)&nbsp;on and after September&nbsp;15, 1999, earthquake coverage for the Improvements (excluding any Tenant's Property) in an amount not less than $10,000,000, with a deductible not more than
five percent (5%) of than the total value of the Improvements insured; and

</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;The fifth sentence of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section 9.4</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> is amended to read in its entirety as follows:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
The certificates shall state that such insurance is in full force and effect and that coverage will not be reduced below the amounts required under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Article
IX</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> or otherwise limited or canceled without ten (10)&nbsp;days' prior written notice to Landlord and Administrative Agent in the case of any cancellation for non-payment of
premiums and thirty (30) days' prior written notice to Landlord and Administrative Agent in the case of any reduction, limitation or cancellation for any other reason.

</FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Waiver.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the satisfaction of the conditions set forth in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 5</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> below, Landlord hereby waives any Event of Default arising out of Tenant's failure to provide earthquake insurance with a
<!-- SEQ.=10,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="3",FOLIO=blank,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]KX2301A.;25',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:42' -->
deductible of not more than $1,000,000 or a certificate of insurance stating that coverage will not be canceled without thirty (30) days' prior written notice.

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Representations and Warranties.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant hereby represents and warrants to
Landlord, the Rent Purchasers and Administrative Agent that the following are true and correct on the date of this Amendment and that, after giving effect to the amendments set forth in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> above, the following will be true and correct on the Effective Date (as defined below):

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The representations and warranties of Tenant set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section 21.18</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of the Lease and in the other Operative
Documents are true and correct in all material respects as if made on such date (except for representations and warranties expressly made as of a specified date, which shall be true as of such date);

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;No Default has occurred and is continuing; and

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;All of the Operative Documents are in full force and effect.

</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
(Without limiting the scope of the term "Operative Documents," Tenant expressly acknowledges in making the representations and warranties set forth in this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph
4</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> that, on and after the date hereof, such term includes this Amendment.)

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective Date.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;The amendments effected by </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph
2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> above and the waiver effected by </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 3</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> above shall become effective on the date (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Effective
Date</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") that Landlord and Administrative Agent receive each of the following, each in form and substance satisfactory to Landlord and Administrative Agent and their respective
counsel:

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The Consent to Amendment duly executed by Majority Rent Purchasers;

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;This Amendment duly executed by Tenant and Landlord;

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;All fees and expenses payable to Landlord, the Rent Purchasers and Administrative Agent on or prior to the Effective Date;

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;All fees and expenses of Landlord's and Administrative Agent's counsels through the Effective Date, to the extent set forth in statements of such counsels delivered
to Lessee on or before the Effective Date; and

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;Such other evidence as Landlord or Administrative Agent may reasonably request to establish the accuracy and completeness in all material respects of the
representations and warranties and the compliance with the terms and conditions contained in this Amendment and the other Operative Documents.

</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Effect of this Amendment.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;On and after the Effective Date, each reference in
the Lease and the other Operative Documents to the Lease shall mean the Lease as amended hereby. Except as specifically amended above, (a)&nbsp;the Lease and the other Operative Documents shall
remain in full force and effect and are hereby ratified and affirmed and (b)&nbsp;the execution, delivery and effectiveness of this Amendment shall not, except as expressly provided herein, operate
as a waiver of any right, power, or remedy of Landlord, the Rent Purchasers or Administrative Agent, nor constitute a waiver of any provision of the Lease or any other Operative Document.

</FONT></P>
<P>

<FONT SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Miscellaneous.</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;

</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Counterparts.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> This Amendment may be executed in any number of identical counterparts, any set of which signed by all
the parties hereto shall be deemed to constitute a complete, executed original for all purposes.

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Headings.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> Headings in this Amendment are for convenience of reference only and are not part of the substance hereof.

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Governing Law.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> This Amendment shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of
California without reference to conflicts of law rules.

</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>
[Signature pages&nbsp;follow]

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Tenant and Landlord have caused this Amendment to be executed as of the day and year first above written.

</FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- SEQ.=4,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=iv,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LA2301A.;17',USER='BSANDFO',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:32' -->
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10.54</B></FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>CREDIT AGREEMENT</I></B></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS CREDIT AGREEMENT, dated as of August&nbsp;11, 1999, is entered into by and among:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(1)&nbsp;ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED, a Delaware corporation ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Borrower</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>");</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(2)&nbsp;Each of the financial institutions from time to time listed in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Schedule I</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereto, as amended from time to time (such
financial institutions to be referred to herein collectively as "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Lenders</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>");</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(3)&nbsp;ABN AMRO BANK N.V., as agent for Lenders (in such capacity, "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Administrative Agent</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(4)&nbsp;BANK OF MONTREAL, THE FIRST NATIONAL BANK OF CHICAGO, FIRST UNION NATIONAL BANK, KEYBANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION and FLEET NATIONAL BANK, as co-agents for Lenders
(each in such capacity, a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Co-Agent"</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>).</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>RECITALS</I></B></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower has requested Lenders to provide certain credit facilities to Borrower.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;Lenders are willing to provide such credit facilities upon the terms and subject to the conditions set forth herein.</FONT></P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>AGREEMENT</I></B></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the above Recitals and the mutual covenants herein contained, the parties hereto hereby agree as follows:</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION I. </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>INTERPRETATION</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.01.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Definitions.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless otherwise indicated in this Agreement or any other Credit Document, each term
set forth below, when used in this Agreement or any other Credit Document, shall have the respective meaning given to that term below or in the provision of this Agreement or other document,
instrument or agreement referenced below.</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>ABN AMRO</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Administrative Agent</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(3) of the introductory
paragraph </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>hereof.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Administrative Agent's Fee Letter</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the letter agreement dated as of March&nbsp;19, 1999, between Borrower and
Administrative Agent regarding certain fees payable by Borrower to Administrative Agent.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Adobe Incentive Partners</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean Adobe Incentive Partners, L.P., a California limited partnership, in which Borrower is the
general partner and all of the limited partners are Borrower or Affiliates of Borrower.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Adobe Incentive Partners Distributions</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean distributions of cash or securities owned by Adobe Incentive Partners, repurchases
of unvested partnership interests in Adobe Incentive Partners, and issuances of partnership interests in Adobe Incentive Partners.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Affiliate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Person, (a)&nbsp;each Person that, directly or indirectly, owns or controls, whether
beneficially or as a trustee, guardian or other fiduciary, ten percent (10%) or more of any class of Equity Securities of such Person, (b)&nbsp;each Person that controls, is controlled by or is
under common control with such Person or any Affiliate of such Person or (c) each of such Person's officers, directors, general partners and, if such Person is a joint venture organized as a separate
legal entity, joint venturers having powers comparable to a general partner; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that in
no case shall any of the following Persons be deemed to be an Affiliate of Borrower or
<!-- SEQ.=5,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=blank,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LA2301A.;17',USER='BSANDFO',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:32' -->
any of its Subsidiaries for purposes of this Agreement: (i)&nbsp;Administrative Agent or any Lender or (ii)&nbsp;the
general partner of any VC Partnership which would otherwise be deemed an Affiliate solely because it acts as general partner and controls such VC Partnership. For the purpose of this definition,
"control" of a Person shall mean the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to direct or cause the direction of its management or policies.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Agents</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean collectively Administrative Agent and the Co-Agents.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Agreement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean this Credit Agreement.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Applicable Lending Office</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Lender, (a)&nbsp;in the case of its Base Rate Loans and Base Rate
Portions, its Domestic Lending Office, and (b)&nbsp;in the case of its LIBOR Loans and LIBOR Portions, its Euro-Dollar Lending Office.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Applicable Margin</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Loan or Portion at any time, the </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per
annum&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>margin which is determined pursuant to the Pricing Grid and added to the Base Rate or LIBO Rate, as the case may be, for such Loan or Portion;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that each Applicable Margin determined pursuant to the Pricing Grid shall be
increased by two percent (2.00%) </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per annum </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>on the date an Event of Default occurs and shall continue at such increased rate unless and until such Event
of Default is waived or cured in accordance with this Agreement. The Applicable Margins shall be determined as provided in the Pricing Grid and may change for each Pricing Period.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Assignee Lender</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 8.05(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Assignment</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 8.05(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Assignment Agreement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
8.05(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Assignment Effective Date</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have, with respect to each Assignment Agreement, the meaning set forth therein.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Assignor Lender</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 8.05(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Base Rate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, on any day, the greater of (a)&nbsp;the Prime Rate in effect on such date and (b)&nbsp;the Federal Funds
Rate for such day </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>one-half percent (0.50%).</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Base Rate Loan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, at any time, a Revolving Loan which then bears interest as provided in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause
(i)&nbsp;of Subparagraph 2.04(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Base Rate Portion</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, at any time, a Portion of the Facility B Term Loan Borrowing or a Facility B Term Loan, as the case may
be, which then bears interest as provided in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (i)&nbsp;of Subparagraph 2.04(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Borrower</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (1)&nbsp;of the introductory
paragraph&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>hereof.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Borrowing</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean a Facility A Revolving Loan Borrowing, a Facility B Revolving Loan Borrowing or the Facility B Term Loan
Borrowing.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Business Day</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean any day on which (a)&nbsp;commercial banks are not authorized or required to close in San Francisco,
California, New York, New York or Chicago, Illinois, and (b)&nbsp;if such Business Day is related to a LIBOR Loan or a LIBOR Portion, dealings in Dollar deposits are carried out in the London
interbank market.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Capital Adequacy Requirement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
2.13(d)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.
<!-- SEQ.=6,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=2,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LA2301A.;17',USER='BSANDFO',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:32' -->
</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Capital Asset</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Person, any tangible fixed or capital asset owned or leased (in the case of a Capital
Lease) by such Person, or any expense incurred by such Person that is required by GAAP to be reported as a non-current asset on such Person's balance sheet.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Capital Leases</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean any and all lease obligations that, in accordance with GAAP, are required to be capitalized on the books of
a lessee.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Change of Control</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;With respect to Borrower, (i)&nbsp;the acquisition after the date hereof by any person or group of persons (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;13 or 14 of the
Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (as amended, the "Exchange Act")) of (A) beneficial ownership (within the meaning of Rule&nbsp;13d-3 promulgated by the Securities and Exchange Commission under the
Exchange Act) of fifty percent (50%) or more of the outstanding Equity Securities of Borrower entitled to vote for members of the board of directors, or (B)&nbsp;all or substantially all of the
assets of Borrower; or (ii)&nbsp;during any period of twelve (12) consecutive calendar months, individuals who are directors of Borrower on the first day of such period ("Initial Directors") and any
directors of Borrower who are specifically approved by two-thirds of the Initial Directors and previously-approved Directors shall cease to constitute a majority of the Board of Directors of Borrower
before the end of such period; or</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;With respect to any Material Subsidiary, Borrower shall cease to own, directly or indirectly, one hundred percent (100%) of the Equity Securities of such Subsidiary
except for nominal amounts of stock necessary to do business in certain jurisdictions outside the United States.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Change of Law</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(b).</I></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Closing Date</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the date, not later than August&nbsp;11, 1999, on which all of the initial conditions precedent described
in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 3.01 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>and </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Schedule 3.01 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>are met.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Co-Agent</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (4)&nbsp;of the introductory
paragraph&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>hereof.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Commitment Fee Percentage</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to either Facility at any time, the </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per
annum&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>percentage which is used to calculate Commitment Fees for such Facility. The Commitment Fee Percentages shall be determined as provided in the Pricing Grid
and may change for each Pricing Period.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Commitment Fees</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, collectively, the Facility A Commitment Fees and the Facility B Commitment Fees.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Commitments</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, collectively, the Facility A Commitments and the Facility B Commitments.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Compliance Certificate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
5.01(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Contingent Obligation</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Person, (a)&nbsp;any Guaranty Obligation of that Person; and (b)&nbsp;any
direct or indirect obligation or liability, contingent or otherwise, of that Person (i)&nbsp;in respect of any Surety Instrument issued for the account of that Person or as to which that Person is
otherwise liable for reimbursement of drawings or payments, (ii)&nbsp;as a partner or joint venturer in any partnership or joint venture, (iii)&nbsp;to purchase any materials, supplies or other
property from, or to obtain the services of, another Person if the relevant contract or other related document or obligation
requires that payment for such materials, supplies or other property, or for such services, shall be made regardless of whether delivery of such materials, supplies or other property is ever made or
tendered, or such services are ever performed or tendered, (iv)&nbsp;in respect to any Rate Contract that is not entered into in connection with a bona fide hedging operation that provides
offsetting benefits
<!-- SEQ.=7,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=3,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LA2301A.;17',USER='BSANDFO',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:32' -->
to such Person, or (v)&nbsp;to purchase or sell Equity Securities or other securities of any Person. The amount of any Contingent Obligation shall (subject, in the case of Guaranty Obligations, to
the last sentence of the definition of "Guaranty Obligation") be deemed equal to the maximum reasonably anticipated liability in respect thereof;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that (A)&nbsp;in the case of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>item (b)(v) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of this definition, the amount of the Contingent
Obligation with respect to the purchase or sale of such Equity Securities or other securities shall be the net settlement amount to be paid in cash or securities, and (B)&nbsp;in the case of</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>item (b)(iv) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of this definition, the Contingent Obligation with respect to such Rate Contracts shall be marked to market on a current basis.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Contractual Obligation</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" of any Person shall mean, any indenture, note, lease, loan agreement, security, deed of trust, mortgage,
security agreement, guaranty, instrument, contract, agreement or other form of contractual obligation or undertaking to which such Person is a party or by which such Person or any of its property is
bound.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Credit Documents</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean and include this Agreement, the Notes and the Administrative Agent's Fee Letter; all other documents,
instruments and agreements delivered to Administrative Agent or any Lender pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 3.01</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>; and all other documents, instruments and
agreements pursuant to the terms of this Agreement required to be delivered by Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries to Administrative Agent or any Lender in connection with this Agreement on or after
the date of this Agreement.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Credit Event</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the making of any Loan (other than the making of a Base Rate Loan solely to repay an existing Loan); the
conversion of any Portion into a LIBOR Portion; or the selection of a new Interest Period for any LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Debt/EBITDA Ratio</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to Borrower for any consecutive four-quarter period, the ratio, determined on a
consolidated basis in accordance with GAAP, of:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The total Indebtedness of Borrower and its Subsidiaries on the last day of such period, excluding any Indebtedness under or with respect to currency exchange Rate
Contracts;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><I>to</I></FONT></P>
</UL>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;The EBITDA of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such period.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Default</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean an Event of Default or any event or circumstance not yet constituting an Event of Default which, with the giving
of any notice or the lapse of any period of time or both, would become an Event of Default.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Defaulting Lender</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean a Lender which has failed to fund its portion of any Borrowing which it is required to fund under this
Agreement and has continued in such failure for five (5)&nbsp;Business Days.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Dollars</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" and "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>$</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the lawful currency of the United States of America and,
in relation to any payment under this Agreement, same day or immediately available funds.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Domestic Lending Office</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Lender, (a) initially, its office designated as such in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Schedule I&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(or, in the case of any Lender which becomes a Lender by an assignment pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
8.05(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, its office designated as such in the applicable Assignment Agreement) and (b) subsequently, such other office or offices as such Lender may designate to Administrative
Agent as the office at which such Lender's Base Rate Loans and Base Rate Portions will thereafter be maintained and for the account of which all payments of principal of, and interest on, such
Lender's Base Rate Loans and Base Rate Portions will thereafter be made.

</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>EBITDA</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to Borrower for any period, the sum, determined on a consolidated basis in accordance with GAAP, of
the following:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The net income or net loss of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such period before provision for income taxes;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus</I></FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;The sum (to the extent deducted in calculating net income or loss in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(a) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>above) of (i)&nbsp;all
Interest Expenses of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such period, (ii)&nbsp;all depreciation and amortization expenses of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such period, and (iii)&nbsp;all
non-cash charges taken by Borrower and its Subsidiaries during such period for in-process research and development.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Eligible Assignee</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean a Person that is a commercial bank or another financial institution which is a qualified institutional
buyer as defined in Rule&nbsp;144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>that (i)&nbsp;such Person has a combined capital and
surplus of at least $100,000,000 and (ii)&nbsp;such Person is acting through a branch, agency or office located in the United States.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Employee Benefit Plan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean any employee benefit plan within the meaning of section 3(3)&nbsp;of ERISA maintained or
contributed to by Borrower or any ERISA Affiliate, other than a Multiemployer Plan.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Environmental Laws</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the Clean Air Act, 42 U.S.C. Section 7401 </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>et seq</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.; the
Federal Water Pollution Control Act, 33 U.S.C. Section 1251 </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>et seq</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.; the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act of 1976, 42 U.S.C. Section 6901</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>et seq</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.; the Comprehensive Environment Response, Compensation and Liability Act of 1980 (including the Superfund Amendments and Reauthorization Act of
1986, "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>CERCLA</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), 42 U.S.C. Section 9601 </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>et seq</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.; the Toxic Substances Control Act, 15 U.S.C. Section
2601 </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>et seq</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.; the Occupational Safety and Health Act, 29 U.S.C. Section 651; the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act of 1986, 42 U.S.C.
Section 11001 </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>et seq</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.; the Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977, 30 U.S.C. Section 801 </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>et seq</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.; the Safe
Drinking Water Act, 42 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;300f </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>et seq</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.; and all other Governmental Rules&nbsp;relating to the protection of human health and the
environment, including all Governmental Rules&nbsp;pertaining to the reporting, licensing, permitting, transportation, storage, disposal, investigation or remediation of emissions, discharges,
releases, or threatened releases of Hazardous Materials into the air, surface water, groundwater, or land, or relating to the manufacture, processing, distribution, use, treatment, storage, disposal,
transportation or handling of Hazardous Materials.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Equity Securities</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" of any Person shall mean (a)&nbsp;all common stock, preferred stock, participations, shares, partnership
interests or other equity interests in and of such Person (regardless of how designated and whether or not voting or non-voting) and (b)&nbsp;all warrants, options and other rights to acquire or
sell any of the foregoing.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>ERISA</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>ERISA Affiliate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean any Person which is treated as a single employer with Borrower under Section 414 of the IRC.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Euro-Dollar Lending Office</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Lender, (a) initially, its office designated as such in</FONT>

Agent as the office at which such Lender's LIBOR Loans and LIBOR Portions will thereafter be maintained and for the account of which all payments of principal of, and interest on, such Lender's LIBOR
Loans and LIBOR Portions will thereafter be made.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Facility A Maturity Date</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean August&nbsp;11, 2002.</FONT></P>

<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;With respect to any Facility A Lender at any time prior to the termination of the Facility A Commitments, the ratio (expressed as a percentage rounded to the eighth
digit to the right of the decimal point) of (i)&nbsp;such Lender's Facility A Commitment at such time </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>to </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(ii)&nbsp;the Total Facility A Commitment
at such time; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;With respect to any Facility A Lender at any time after the termination of the Facility A Commitments, the ratio (expressed as a percentage rounded to the eighth
digit to the right of the decimal point) of (i)&nbsp;the aggregate principal amount of such Lender's Facility A Revolving Loans outstanding at such time </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>to</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(ii)&nbsp;the sum of the aggregate principal
amount of all Facility A Revolving Loans outstanding at such time.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Facility A Revolving Loan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph

<P><FONT SIZE=2>

the Facility A Lenders on the same date and of the same Type pursuant to a single Notice of Revolving Loan Borrowing.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

2.02</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>

Commitment at such time; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>

eighth digit to the right of the decimal point) of (i)&nbsp;the aggregate principal amount of such Lender's Facility B Loans outstanding at such time</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>to</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> (ii)&nbsp;the sum of the aggregate principal amount of all Facility B Loans outstanding at such time.</FONT></P>

</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Federal Funds Rate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, for any day, the rate </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per annum </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>set forth in the
weekly statistical release designated as H.15(519), or any successor publication, published by the Federal Reserve Board (including any such successor publication, "H.15 (519)") for such day opposite
the caption "Federal Funds (Effective)". If on any relevant day, such rate is not yet published in H.15 (519), the rate for such day shall be the rate set forth in the daily statistical release
designated as the Composite 3:30&nbsp;p.m. Quotations for U.S. Government Securities, or any successor publication, published by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York (including any such successor
publication, the "Composite 3:30&nbsp;p.m. Quotations") for such day under the caption "Federal Funds Effective Rate". If on any relevant day, such rate is not yet published in either H.15 (519) or
the Composite 3:30&nbsp;p.m. Quotations, the rate for such
day shall be the arithmetic mean, as determined by Administrative Agent, of the rates quoted to Administrative Agent for such day by three (3)&nbsp;Federal funds brokers of recognized standing
selected by Administrative Agent, and Administrative Agent shall promptly provide written evidence of such calculation to Borrower.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Federal Reserve Board</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Financial Statements</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any accounting period for any Person, statements of income, shareholders' equity and
cash flows of such Person for such period, and a balance sheet of such Person as of the end of such period, setting forth in each case in comparative form figures for the corresponding period in the
preceding fiscal year if such period is less than a full fiscal year or, if such period is a full fiscal year, corresponding figures from the preceding annual audit, all prepared in reasonable detail
and in accordance with GAAP.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to Borrower for any consecutive four-quarter period, the ratio, determined on a
consolidated basis in accordance with GAAP, of:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The sum of (i)&nbsp;the net income of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such period, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(ii)&nbsp;to the
extent deducted in calculating such net income, (A)&nbsp;all Interest Expenses of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such period, (B) all income tax expenses of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such
period, (C) all rental expenses of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such period, (D)&nbsp;all non-cash charges taken by Borrower and its Subsidiaries during such period for in-process research and
development, and (E)&nbsp;all amortization charges for goodwill taken by Borrower and its Subsidiaries during such period;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><I>to</I></FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;The sum of (i)&nbsp;all Interest Expenses of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such period, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(ii)&nbsp;all
rental expenses of Borrower and its Subsidiaries for such period, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(iii)&nbsp;the current portion of all long-term Indebtedness of Borrower and
its Subsidiaries appearing on the consolidated balance sheet of Borrower and its Subsidiaries on the last day of such period, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>without
<!-- SEQ.=11,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=7,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LA2301A.;17',USER='BSANDFO',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:32' -->
duplication, (iv)&nbsp;twenty percent (20%) of all off-balance sheet Indebtedness of Borrower and its Subsidiaries on the last day of such period;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that any Indebtedness under or with respect to currency exchange Rate Contracts shall
be excluded for purposes of the calculation under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>subparagraph (b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>"Foreign Plan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean any employee benefit plan maintained by Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries which is mandated or governed by
any Governmental Rule of any Governmental Authority other than the United States.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>GAAP</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean generally accepted accounting principles and practices as in effect in the United States of America from time to
time, consistently applied.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Governmental Authority</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean any domestic or foreign national, state or local government, any political subdivision thereof, any
department, agency, authority or bureau of any of the foregoing, or any other entity exercising executive, legislative, judicial, regulatory or administrative functions of or pertaining to government,
including, without limitation, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, the Federal Reserve Board, the Comptroller of the Currency, any central bank or any comparable authority.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Governmental Charges</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Person, all levies, assessments, fees, claims or other charges imposed by any
Governmental Authority upon such Person or any of its property or otherwise payable by such Person.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Governmental Rule</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean any law, rule, regulation, ordinance, order, code interpretation, judgment, decree, directive,
guidelines, policy or similar form of decision of any Governmental Authority which is made publicly available.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Granting Lender</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 8.05(d)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Guaranty Obligation</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Person, any direct or indirect liability of that Person with respect to any
indebtedness, lease, dividend, letter of credit or other obligation (the "primary obligations") of another Person (the "primary obligor"), including any obligation of that Person, whether or not
contingent, (a)&nbsp;to purchase, repurchase or otherwise acquire such primary obligations or any property constituting direct or indirect security therefor, or (b)&nbsp;to advance or provide
funds (i)&nbsp;for the payment or discharge of any such primary obligation, or (ii)&nbsp;to maintain working capital or equity capital of the primary obligor or otherwise to maintain the net worth
or solvency or any balance sheet item, level of income or financial condition of the primary obligor, or (c)&nbsp;to purchase property, securities or services primarily for the purpose of assuring
the owner of any such primary obligation of the ability of the primary obligor to make payment of such primary obligation, or (d)&nbsp;otherwise to assure or hold harmless the holder of any such
primary obligation against loss in respect thereof. The amount of any Guaranty Obligation shall be deemed equal to the stated or determinable amount of the primary obligation in respect of which such
Guaranty Obligation is made or, if not stated or if indeterminable, the maximum reasonably anticipated liability in respect thereof.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Hazardous Materials</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean all pollutants, contaminants and other materials, substances and wastes which are hazardous, toxic,
caustic, harmful or dangerous to human health or the environment, including petroleum and petroleum products and byproducts, radioactive materials, asbestos, polychlorinated biphenyls and all
materials, substances and wastes which are classified or regulated as "hazardous," "toxic" or similar descriptions under any Environmental Law.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Indebtedness</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" of any Person shall mean, without duplication:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;All obligations of such Person evidenced by notes, bonds, debentures or other similar instruments and all other obligations of such Person for borrowed money
(including obligations to repurchase receivables and other assets sold with recourse);
<!-- SEQ.=12,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=8,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LA2301A.;17',USER='BSANDFO',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:32' -->
</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;All obligations of such Person for the deferred purchase price of property or services (including obligations under letters of credit and other credit facilities
which secure or finance such purchase price and obligations under "synthetic" leases);</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;All obligations of such Person under conditional sale or other title retention agreements with respect to property acquired by such Person (to the extent of the
value of such property if the rights and remedies of the seller or lender under such agreement in the event of default are limited solely to repossession or sale of such property);</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;All obligations of such Person as lessee under or with respect to Capital Leases;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;All non-contingent payment or reimbursement obligations of such Person under or with respect to Surety Instruments;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;All net obligations of such Person, contingent or otherwise, under or with respect to Rate Contracts;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(g)&nbsp;All Guaranty Obligations of such Person with respect to the obligations of other Persons of the types described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clauses
(a)&nbsp;-&nbsp;(f) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>above and all other Contingent Obligations of such Person; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(h)&nbsp;All obligations of other Persons of the types described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clauses (a)&nbsp;-&nbsp;(f) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>above to the
extent secured by (or for which any holder of such obligations has an existing right, contingent or otherwise, to be secured by) any Lien in any property (including accounts and contract rights) of
such Person, even though such Person has not assumed or become liable for the payment of such obligations.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Interest Expenses</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Person for any period, the sum, determined on a consolidated basis in accordance
with GAAP, of (a)&nbsp;all interest on the Indebtedness of such Person paid or accrued during such period (including interest attributable to Capital Leases) plus (b)&nbsp;all fees in respect of
outstanding letters of credit paid or accrued by such Person during such period.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Interest Period</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion, the time period selected by Borrower pursuant to</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.03(a), Subparagraph 2.03(b)&nbsp;or Subparagraph 2.04(c) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>which commences on the first day of such Loan or Portion or the effective date
of any conversion and ends on the last day of such time period, and thereafter, each subsequent time period selected by Borrower pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
2.04(b)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>which commences on the last day of the immediately preceding time period and ends on the last day of that time period.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>"Investment"</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of any Person shall mean any loan or advance of funds by such Person to any other Person (other than advances to employees
of such Person for moving and travel expenses, drawing accounts and similar expenditures in the ordinary course of business), any purchase or other acquisition of any Equity Securities or Indebtedness
of any other Person, any capital contribution by such Person to or any other investment by such Person in any other Person (including any Guaranty Obligations of such Person and any indebtedness of
such Person of the type described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (h) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of the definition of "Indebtedness" on behalf of any other Person);</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that Investments shall not include (a) accounts receivable or other indebtedness owed
by customers of such Person which are current assets and arose from sales of inventory in the ordinary course of such Person's business, (b)&nbsp;prepaid expenses of such Person incurred and prepaid
in the ordinary course of business, or (c)&nbsp;acquisitions of Equity Securities subject to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 5.02(d)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>"IRC"</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>"Lenders"</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (2)&nbsp;of the introductory
paragraph&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>hereof.
<!-- SEQ.=13,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=9,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LA2301A.;17',USER='BSANDFO',CD='15-OCT-1999;14:32' -->
</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>"LIBO Rate"</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall mean, with respect to any Interest Period for the LIBOR Loans in any Revolving Loan Borrowing consisting of LIBOR
Loans or any LIBOR Portion of the Facility B Term Loan Borrowing, a rate </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per annum</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> equal to the quotient (rounded upward if necessary to the nearest
<SUP>1</SUP>/<SMALL>100</SMALL> of one percent) of:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;As elected by Borrower, either:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The arithmetic mean (rounded upward if necessary to the nearest <SUP>1</SUP>/<SMALL>16</SMALL> of one percent) of the rates </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per
annum&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>appearing on Telerate Page&nbsp;3750 (or any successor publication) on the second Business Day prior to the first day of such Interest Period at or about
11:00&nbsp;A.M. (London time) (for delivery on the first day of such Interest Period) for a term comparable to such Interest Period (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Telerate
Page&nbsp;Rate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); or</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;The arithmetic mean (rounded upward if necessary to the nearest <SUP>1</SUP>/<SMALL>16</SMALL> of one percent) of the rates </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per
annum&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>at which Dollar deposits are offered to each of the Reference Banks in the London interbank market on the second Business Day prior to the first day of
such Interest Period at or about 11:00&nbsp;A.M. (London time) (for delivery on the first day of such Interest Period) in an amount substantially equal to such Reference Bank's LIBOR Loan or LIBOR
Portion in such Borrowing and for a term comparable to such Interest Period (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Reference Bank Rate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>");</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><I>divided by</I></FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;One minus the Reserve Requirement for such Loans or Portion in effect from time to time.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
If, for any reason, any Reference Banks do not provide Administrative Agent with rates pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (a)(ii) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>after Borrower elects the Reference
Bank Rate to determine the LIBO Rate for any Interest Period, Administrative Agent shall calculate the Reference Bank Rate for such Interest Period based upon the rate or rates provided by the other
Reference Banks or Reference Bank; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that, if no Reference Bank provides Administrative
Agent with such a rate, Administrative Agent shall determine the LIBO Rate for such Interest Period based upon the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate. If, for any reason, the Telerate Page Rate is not
available after Borrower elects the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate to determine the LIBO Rate for any Interest Period, Administrative Agent shall determine the LIBO Rate for such Interest Period based upon
the Reference Bank Rate. The LIBO Rate shall be adjusted automatically as to all LIBOR Loans and LIBOR Portions then outstanding as of the effective date of any change in the Reserve Requirement.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>LIBOR Loan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, at any time, a Revolving Loan which then bears interest as provided in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause
(ii)&nbsp;of Subparagraph 2.04(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>LIBOR Portion</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, at any time, a Portion of the Facility B Term Loan Borrowing or a Facility B Term Loan, as the case may be,
which then bears interest as provided in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (ii)&nbsp;of Subparagraph 2.04(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Lien</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any property, any security interest, mortgage, pledge, lien, charge or other encumbrance in, of, or
on such property or the income therefrom, including, without limitation, the interest of a vendor or lessor under a conditional sale agreement, Capital Lease or other title retention agreement, or any
agreement to provide any of the foregoing, and the filing of any financing statement or similar instrument under the Uniform Commercial Code or comparable law of any jurisdiction other than filings
made for notice purposes only in connection with true leases (which would not include "synthetic" leases).</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Loan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean a Revolving Loan or Facility B Term Loan.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Loan Account</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.10(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Required Lenders</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, at any time, Lenders whose Proportionate Shares then equal or exceed sixty-six and two-thirds percent
(66<SUP>2</SUP>/<SMALL>3</SMALL>%), except at any time any Lender is a Defaulting Lender. (For the purposes of determining "Required Lenders" at any time any Lender is a Defaulting Lender, the "Proportionate
Shares" of non-defaulting Lenders shall be determined excluding from the Total Facility A Commitment, the Total Facility B Commitment and the aggregate principal amount of all Facility B Term Loans
the aggregate amounts of the Defaulting Lenders' Facility A Commitments, Facility B Commitments and Facility B Term Loans; and "Required Lenders" shall mean non-defaulting Lenders whose Proportionate
Shares as so determined then equal or exceed sixty-six and two-thirds percent (66<SUP>2</SUP>/<SMALL>3</SMALL>%).)</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Requirement of Law</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" applicable to any Person shall mean (a)&nbsp;the Articles or Certificate of Incorporation and By-laws,
Partnership Agreement or other organizational or governing documents of such Person, (b)&nbsp;any Governmental Rule applicable to such Person, (c)&nbsp;any license, permit, approval or other
authorization granted by any Governmental Authority to or for the benefit of such Person or (d)&nbsp;any judgment, decision or determination of any Governmental Authority or arbitrator, in each case
applicable to or binding upon such Person or any of its property or to which such Person or any of its property is subject.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Reserve Requirement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any day in an Interest Period for a LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion, the aggregate of the
reserve requirement rates (expressed as a decimal) in effect on such day for eurocurrency funding (currently referred to as "Eurocurrency liabilities" in Regulation&nbsp;D of the Federal Reserve
Board) maintained by a member bank of the Federal Reserve System. As used
herein, the term "reserve requirement" shall include, without limitation, any basic, supplemental or emergency reserve requirements imposed on any Lender by any Governmental Authority.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Revolving Loan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean a Facility A Revolving Loan or a Facility B Revolving Loan.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Revolving Loan Borrowing</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean a Facility A Revolving Loan Borrowing or a Facility B Revolving Loan Borrowing.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Revolving Loan Note</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
2.10(b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Solvent</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Person on any date, that on such date (a)&nbsp;the fair value of the property of such
Person is greater than the fair value of the liabilities (including contingent, subordinated, matured and unliquidated liabilities) of such Person, (b)&nbsp;the present fair saleable value of the
assets of such Person is greater than the amount that will be required to pay the probable liability of such Person on its debts as they become absolute and matured, (c)&nbsp;such Person does not
intend to, and does not believe that it will, incur debts or liabilities beyond such Person's ability to pay as such debts and liabilities mature and (d)&nbsp;such Person is not engaged in or about
to engage in
<!-- SEQ.=4,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=14,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LB2301A.;5',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
business or transactions for which such Person's property would constitute an unreasonably small capital.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>SPC</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 8.05(d)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subsidiary</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" of any Person shall mean (a)&nbsp;any corporation of which more than 50% of the issued and outstanding Equity Securities
having ordinary voting power to elect a majority of the Board of Directors of such corporation (irrespective of whether at the time capital stock of any other class or classes of such corporation
shall or might have voting power upon the occurrence of any contingency) is at the time directly or indirectly owned or controlled by such Person, by such Person and one or more of its other
Subsidiaries or by one or more of such Person's other Subsidiaries, (b)&nbsp;any partnership, joint venture, limited liability company or other association of which more than 50% of the equity
interest having the power to vote, direct or control the management of such partnership, joint venture or other association is at the time owned and controlled by such Person, by such Person and one
or more of the other Subsidiaries or by one or more of such Person's other Subsidiaries or (c)&nbsp;any other Person whose results of operations are included in the Financial Statements of such
Person on a consolidated basis.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Surety Instruments</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean all letters of credit (including standby and commercial), banker's acceptances, bank guaranties,
shipside bonds, surety bonds and similar instruments.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Taxes</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to such term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.14(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (a)(i)&nbsp;of the definition
of "LIBO Rate" in Paragraph 1.01</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Term Loan Note</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.10(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Total Facility A Commitment</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, at any time, the sum at such time of the Facility A Lenders' Facility A Commitments.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Total Facility B Commitment</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, at any time, the sum at such time of the Facility B Lenders' Facility B Commitments.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Type</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean, with respect to any Loan, Borrowing or Portion at any time, the classification of such Loan, Borrowing or Portion by
the type of interest rate it then bears, whether an interest rate based upon the Base Rate or the LIBO Rate.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Unused</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall mean</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;With respect to the Facility A Commitment at any time, the remainder of (i) the Total Facility A Commitment at such time minus (ii)&nbsp;the aggregate principal
amount of all Facility A Revolving Loans outstanding at such time; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;With respect to the Facility B Commitment at any time, the remainder of (i) the Total Facility B Commitment at such time minus (ii)&nbsp;the aggregate principal
amount of all Facility B Revolving Loans outstanding at such time.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>VC Partnership</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" shall have the meaning given to that term in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 5.02(e)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.02.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;GAAP.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless otherwise indicated in this Agreement or any other Credit Document, all accounting
terms used in this Agreement or any other Credit Document shall be construed, and all accounting and financial computations hereunder or thereunder shall be computed, in accordance with GAAP. If GAAP
changes during the term of this Agreement such that any covenants contained herein would then be calculated in a different manner or with different components, Borrower, Lenders and Administrative
Agent agree to negotiate in good faith to amend this Agreement in such respects as are necessary to conform those covenants as criteria for evaluating Borrower's financial condition to substantially
the same criteria as were effective prior to such change in GAAP; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that, until
<!-- SEQ.=5,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=15,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LB2301A.;5',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
Borrower, Lenders and Administrative Agent so amend this Agreement, all such covenants shall be calculated in accordance with GAAP as in effect immediately prior to such change.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.03.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Headings.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Headings in this Agreement and each of the other Credit Documents are for convenience
of reference only and are not part of the substance hereof or thereof.</FONT></P>
