<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.04.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Plural Terms.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;All terms defined in this Agreement or any other Credit Document in the singular
form shall have comparable meanings when used in the plural form and vice versa.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.05.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Time.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;All references in this Agreement and each of the other Credit Documents to a time of day
shall mean San Francisco, California time, unless otherwise indicated.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.06.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Governing Law.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless otherwise expressly provided in any Credit Document, this Agreement and
each of the other Credit Documents shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California without reference to conflicts of law rules.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.07.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Construction.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement is the result of negotiations among, and has been reviewed by,
Borrower, each Lender, Administrative Agent and their respective counsel. Accordingly, this Agreement shall be deemed to be the product of all parties hereto, and no ambiguity shall be construed in
favor of or against Borrower, any Lender or Administrative Agent.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.08.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Entire Agreement.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement and each of the other Credit Documents, taken together,
constitute and contain the entire agreement of Borrower, Lenders and Administrative Agent and supersede any and all prior agreements, negotiations, correspondence, understandings and communications
among the parties, whether written or oral, respecting the subject matter hereof (including the commitment
letter dated as of March&nbsp;19, 1999, between Borrower and ABN AMRO but excluding the Administrative Agent's Fee Letter).</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.09.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Calculation of Interest and Fees.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;All calculations of interest and fees under this Agreement and
the other Credit Documents for any period (a) shall include the first day of such period and exclude the last day of such period and (b)&nbsp;shall be calculated on the basis of a year of 360 days
for actual days elapsed, except that during any period any Loan or Portion bears interest based upon the Prime Rate, such interest shall be calculated on the basis of a year of 365 or 366 days, as
appropriate, for actual days elapsed.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.10.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;References.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;References in this Agreement to "Recitals," "Sections," "Paragraphs," "Subparagraphs," "Exhibits" and "Schedules" are to recitals, sections, paragraphs,
subparagraphs, exhibits and schedules therein and thereto unless otherwise indicated.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;References in this Agreement or any other Credit Document to any document, instrument or agreement (i)&nbsp;shall include all exhibits, schedules and other
attachments thereto, (ii)&nbsp;shall include all documents, instruments or agreements issued or executed in replacement thereof if such replacement is permitted hereby, and (iii)&nbsp;shall mean
such document, instrument or agreement, or replacement or predecessor thereto, as amended, modified and supplemented from time to time and in effect at any given time if such amendment, modification
or supplement is permitted hereby.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;References in this Agreement or any other Credit Document to any Governmental Rule&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;shall include any successor Governmental Rule,
(ii)&nbsp;shall include all rules&nbsp;and regulations promulgated under such Governmental Rule&nbsp;(or any successor Governmental Rule), and (iii)&nbsp;shall mean such Governmental Rule (or
successor Governmental Rule) and such rules&nbsp;and regulations, as amended, modified, codified or reenacted from time to time and in effect at any given time.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;References in this Agreement or any other Credit Document to any Person in a particular capacity (i)&nbsp;shall include any permitted successors to and assigns of
such Person in that capacity and (ii)&nbsp;shall exclude such Person individually or in any other capacity.
<!-- SEQ.=6,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=16,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LB2301A.;5',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.11.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Other Interpretive Provisions.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;The words "hereof," "herein" and "hereunder" and words of similar
import when used in this Agreement or any other Credit Document shall refer to this Agreement or such other Credit Document, as the case may be, as a whole and not to any particular provision of this
Agreement or such other Credit Document, as the case may be. The words "include" and "including" and words of similar import when used in this Agreement or any other Credit Document shall not be
construed to be limiting or exclusive. In the event of any inconsistency between the terms of this Agreement and the terms of any other Credit Document, the terms of this Agreement shall govern.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION II. </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>CREDIT FACILITIES.</I></B></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.01.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Facility A.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Availability.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, each Facility A Lender
severally agrees to advance to Borrower from time to time during the period beginning on the Closing Date and
ending on the Facility A Maturity Date such loans as Borrower may request under Facility A (individually, a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Facility A Revolving Loan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>");</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The aggregate principal amount of all Facility A Revolving Loans made by each Facility&nbsp;A Lender at any time outstanding shall not exceed such Lender's
Facility&nbsp;A Commitment at such time; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;The aggregate principal amount of all Facility A Revolving Loans made by all Facility A Lenders at any time outstanding shall not exceed the Total Facility A
Commitment at such time.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
All Facility A Revolving Loans shall be made on a </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>pro rata </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>basis by Facility A Lenders in accordance with their respective Facility A Proportionate
Shares, with each Facility A Borrowing to be comprised of a Facility A Revolving Loan by each Facility A Lender equal to such Lender's Facility A Proportionate Share of such Borrowing. Except as
otherwise provided herein, Borrower may borrow, repay and reborrow Facility A Revolving Loans until the Facility A Maturity Date.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Repayment.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower shall repay the outstanding principal amount of all Facility&nbsp;A Revolving
Loans on the Facility&nbsp;A Maturity Date.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.02.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Facility&nbsp;B.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Revolving Loans.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Availability.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, each Facility&nbsp;B Lender
severally agrees to advance to Borrower from time to time during the period beginning on the Closing Date and ending on the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date such revolving loans as
Borrower may request under Facility&nbsp;B (individually, a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>");</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(A)&nbsp;The aggregate principal amount of all Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loans made by each Facility&nbsp;B Lender at any time outstanding shall not exceed such Lender's
Facility&nbsp;B Commitment at such time; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(B)&nbsp;The aggregate principal amount of all Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loans made by all Facility&nbsp;B Lenders at any time outstanding shall not exceed the Total
Facility&nbsp;B Commitment at such time.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
All Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loans shall be made on </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>a pro rata </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>basis by Facility&nbsp;B Lenders in accordance with their respective
Facility&nbsp;B Proportionate Shares, with each Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Borrowing to be comprised of a Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan by each Facility&nbsp;B Lender equal to such
Lender's Facility&nbsp;B Proportionate Share of such Borrowing. Except as otherwise provided herein, Borrower may borrow, repay and reborrow Facility B Revolving Loans until the Facility&nbsp;B
Revolving Loan Maturity Date.
<!-- SEQ.=7,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=17,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LB2301A.;5',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Repayment.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless Borrower converts all Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loans outstanding on the
Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date into term loans pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.02(b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, Borrower shall repay the outstanding principal
amount of all Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loans on such date.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Term Loans.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Availability.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, each Facility&nbsp;B Lender
severally agrees, if so requested by Borrower, to advance to Borrower on the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date a term loan under Facility&nbsp;B (individually, a
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Facility B Term Loan</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") by converting all Facility&nbsp;B
Revolving Loans made by such Lender and outstanding on such date into a term loan; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,
that:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(A)&nbsp;The aggregate principal amount of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan made by each Facility&nbsp;B Lender shall not exceed such Lender's Facility B Commitment on the
Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(B)&nbsp;The aggregate principal amount of all Facility&nbsp;B Term Loans made by all Facility&nbsp;B Lenders shall not exceed the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment on
the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
The Facility&nbsp;B Term Loans shall be made on a pro rata basis by Facility&nbsp;B Lenders in accordance with their respective Facility&nbsp;B Proportionate Shares, with the Facility&nbsp;B
Term Loan Borrowing to be comprised of a Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan by each Facility&nbsp;B Lender equal to such Lender's Facility&nbsp;B Proportionate Share of such Borrowing. Borrower may not
reborrow the principal amount of a Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan after any prepayment or repayment thereof.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Repayment.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower shall repay the principal amount of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loans in full
in a single installment payable on the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Maturity Date.</FONT></P>
</UL>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.03.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Notice of Borrowing.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Notice of Revolving Loan Borrowing.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower shall request each Revolving Loan Borrowing by
delivering to Administrative Agent an irrevocable written notice in the form of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, appropriately completed (a
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Notice of Revolving Loan Borrowing</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), which specifies, among other things:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;Whether such Revolving Loan Borrowing is under Facility&nbsp;A or Facility&nbsp;B;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;The principal amount of the requested Revolving Loan Borrowing, which shall be in the amount of (A)&nbsp;$1,000,000 or an integral multiple of $100,000 in excess
thereof in the case of a Borrowing consisting of Base Rate Loans; or (B)&nbsp;$2,500,000 or an integral multiple of $500,000 in excess thereof in the case of a Borrowing consisting of LIBOR Loans;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;Whether the requested Revolving Loan Borrowing is to consist of Base Rate Loans or LIBOR Loans;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;If the requested Revolving Loan Borrowing is to consist of LIBOR Loans, the initial Interest Period selected by Borrower for such LIBOR Loans in accordance with</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.04(b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(v)&nbsp;If the requested Revolving Loan Borrowing is to consist of LIBOR Loans, whether the initial LIBO Rate is to be based upon the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate or the
Reference Bank Rate; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(vi)&nbsp;The date of the requested Revolving Loan Borrowing, which shall be a Business Day;</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2><I>Provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that all Revolving Loan Borrowings made during the period commencing on the date of
this Agreement and ending three (3)&nbsp;Business Days thereafter shall consist solely of Base Rate
<!-- SEQ.=8,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=18,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LB2301A.;5',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
Loans. Borrower shall give each Notice of Revolving Loan Borrowing to Administrative Agent at least three (3) Business Days before the date of the requested Revolving Loan Borrowing in the case of a
Revolving Loan Borrowing consisting of LIBOR Loans and at least one (1)&nbsp;Business Day before the date of the requested Revolving Loan Borrowing in the case of a Revolving Loan Borrowing
consisting of Base Rate Loans. Each Notice of Revolving Loan Borrowing shall be delivered by first-class mail or facsimile to Administrative Agent at the office or facsimile number and during the
hours specified in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph&nbsp;8.01</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that
(A)&nbsp;Borrower shall promptly deliver to Administrative Agent the original of any Notice of Revolving Loan Borrowing initially delivered by facsimile and (B)&nbsp;in the case of any outstanding
Revolving Loan Borrowing which is being rolled over in the same principal amount, Borrower may deliver such Notice of Revolving Loan Borrowing electronically, with a digital signature, to the email
address of Administrative Agent. Administrative Agent shall promptly notify each Lender of the contents of each Notice of Revolving Loan Borrowing.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Notice of Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower shall request the Facility&nbsp;B Term
Loan Borrowing by delivering to Administrative Agent an irrevocable written notice in the form of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;B</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, appropriately completed (the
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Notice of Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), which specifies, among other things:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The principal amount of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;(A)&nbsp;The principal portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing which is to be a Base Rate Portion and (B)&nbsp;the principal portion(s) of the
Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing which is (are) to be a LIBOR Portion(s);</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;If any portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing is initially to be a LIBOR Portion, the initial Interest Period selected by Borrower for each such
LIBOR Portion in accordance with </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.04(b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;If any portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing is initially to be a LIBOR Portion, whether the initial LIBO Rate for such Portion is to be based upon
the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate or the Reference Bank Rate.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Borrower shall give the Notice of Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing to Administrative Agent at least five (5)&nbsp;Business Days before the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date. The
Notice of Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing shall be delivered by first-class mail or facsimile to Administrative Agent at the office or facsimile number and during the hours specified in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph&nbsp;8.01</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that Borrower
shall promptly deliver to Administrative Agent the original of the Notice of Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing if initially delivered by facsimile. Administrative Agent shall promptly notify each
Lender of the contents of the Notice of Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.04.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Interest.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Interest Rates.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower shall pay interest on the unpaid principal amount of each Loan from the
date of such Loan until the Maturity thereof, at one of the following rates </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per annum</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;During such periods as any Revolving Loan is a Base Rate Loan or any Portion of a Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan is a Base Rate Portion, at a rate</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>per annum</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> on such Loan or Portion equal to the Base Rate </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>plus</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> the Applicable Margin therefor, such rate
to change from time to time as the Applicable Margin or Base Rate shall change; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;During such periods as any Revolving Loan is a LIBOR Loan or any Portion of a Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan is a LIBOR Portion, at a rate </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per
annum</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> on such Loan or Portion equal at all times during each Interest Period for such Loan or Portion to the LIBO Rate for such Interest Period</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>plus</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> the Applicable Margin therefor, such rate to change from time to time during such Interest Period as the Applicable Margin shall change.
<!-- SEQ.=9,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=19,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LB2301A.;5',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
All Revolving Loans in each Revolving Loan Borrowing shall, at any given time prior to Maturity, bear interest at one, and only one, of the above rates. The number of Revolving Loan Borrowings in each
Facility consisting of LIBOR Loans shall not exceed five (5)&nbsp;at any time. Each Base Rate Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing shall be in a minimum amount of $1,000,000 or an
integral multiple of $100,000 in excess thereof and each LIBOR Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing shall be in a minimum amount of $2,500,000 or an integral multiple of $500,000 in
excess thereof. The number of LIBOR Portions of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing shall not exceed five (5)&nbsp;at any time.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;LIBOR Loan and LIBOR Portion Interest Periods.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The initial and each subsequent Interest Period selected by Borrower for a Revolving Loan Borrowing consisting of LIBOR Loans or a LIBOR Portion of the
Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing shall be one (1), two (2), three (3), six (6), nine (9)&nbsp;or twelve (12) months; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that (A)&nbsp;any Interest Period that would otherwise end on a day which is not a Business Day shall be extended to the next succeeding
Business Day unless such next Business Day falls in another calendar month, in which case such Interest Period shall end on the immediately preceding Business Day; (B)&nbsp;any Interest Period that
begins on the last Business Day of a calendar month (or on a day for which there is no numerically corresponding day in the calendar month at the end of such Interest Period) shall end on the last
Business Day of a calendar month; and (C)&nbsp;no Interest Period shall end after the applicable Maturity Date.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;Borrower shall notify Administrative Agent by an irrevocable written notice in the form of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;C</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,
appropriately completed (a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Notice of Interest Period Selection</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), at least three (3)&nbsp;Business Days prior to the last day of each Interest Period
for a Revolving Loan Borrowing consisting of LIBOR Loans or a LIBOR Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing of the Interest Period selected by Borrower for the next succeeding Interest
Period for such LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portion and whether the LIBO Rate for such Interest Period is to be based upon the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate or the Reference Bank Rate. Each Notice of Interest
Period Selection shall be given by first-class mail or facsimile to the office or the facsimile number and during the hours specified in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph&nbsp;8.01</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that
(A)&nbsp;Borrower shall promptly deliver to Administrative Agent the original of any Notice of Interest Period Selection initially delivered by facsimile and (B)&nbsp;in the case of any Notice of
Interest Period Selection for any outstanding Revolving Loan Borrowing consisting of LIBOR Loans or any outstanding LIBOR Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing which is being rolled
over in the same principal amount, Borrower may deliver such Notice of Interest Period Selection electronically, with a digital signature, to the email address of Administrative Agent. If Borrower
fails to notify Administrative Agent of the next Interest Period for a Revolving Loan Borrowing consisting of LIBOR Loans or a LIBOR Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing in accordance
with this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.04(b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, such LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portion shall automatically convert to Base Rate Loans or a Base Rate Portion, as the
case may be, on the last day of the current Interest Period therefor. If Borrower fails to notify Administrative Agent whether the LIBO Rate for any Interest Period is to be based upon the Telerate
Page&nbsp;Rate or the Reference Bank Rate, the LIBO Rate for such Interest Period shall automatically be based upon the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Conversion of Term Loan Portions.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower may convert any Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term
Loan Borrowing from one Type of Portion into another Type; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that any conversion of a
LIBOR Portion into a Base Rate Portion shall be made on, and only on, the last day of an Interest Period for such LIBOR Portion. Borrower shall request such a conversion by an irrevocable written
notice to Administrative Agent in the form of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;D</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, appropriately completed (a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Notice of Term Loan
Conversion</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), which specifies, among other things:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing which is to be converted;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- SEQ.=10,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=20,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LB2301A.;5',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
</FONT></P>
</UL>
</UL>
<!-- Generated by Merrill Corporation (www.merrillcorp.com) -->
<UL>
<UL>
<BR>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;The amount and Type of each Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing into which it is to be converted;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;If any Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing is to be converted into a LIBOR Portion, the initial Interest Period selected by Borrower for such
Portion in accordance with </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.04(b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;If any Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing is to be converted into a LIBOR Portion, whether the initial LIBO Rate for such Portion is to be based
upon the Telerate Page&nbsp;Rate or the Reference Bank Rate; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(v)&nbsp;The date of the requested conversion, which shall be a Business Day.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Borrower shall give each Notice of Term Loan Conversion to Administrative Agent at least three (3)&nbsp;Business Days before the date of the requested conversion. Each Notice of Term Loan Conversion
shall be delivered by first-class mail or facsimile to Administrative Agent at the office or to the facsimile number and during the hours specified in</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph&nbsp;8.01</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that
(A)&nbsp;Borrower shall promptly deliver to Administrative Agent the original of any Notice of Term Loan Conversion initially delivered by facsimile and (B)&nbsp;in the case of any Notice of Term
Loan Conversion for any outstanding Portion of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loan Borrowing which is being rolled over into another Type of Portion in the same principal amount, Borrower may deliver such
Notice of Term Loan Conversion electronically, with a digital signature, to the email address of Administrative Agent. Administrative Agent shall promptly notify each Lender of the contents of each
Notice of Term Loan Conversion.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Scheduled Interest Payments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower shall pay accrued interest on the unpaid principal amount of
each Loan in arrears (i)&nbsp;in the case of a Base Rate Loan or Base Rate Portion, on the first day in each January, April, July&nbsp;and October&nbsp;(commencing October&nbsp;1, 1999),
(ii)&nbsp;in the case of a LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion, on the last day of each Interest Period therefor (and, if any such Interest Period is longer than three (3)&nbsp;months, every three
(3)&nbsp;months); and (iii)&nbsp;in the case of all Loans, upon prepayment (to the extent thereof) and at Maturity.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.05.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Purpose.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;Borrower shall use the proceeds of the Facility&nbsp;A Revolving Loans for Borrower's working capital and other general corporate purposes.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;Borrower shall use the proceeds of the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loans to repurchase shares of its common stock to the extent permitted hereby and for Borrower's
general corporate purposes. Borrower shall use the proceeds of the Facility&nbsp;B Term Loans solely to repay the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loans on the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity
Date.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.06.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Commitment Reductions, Etc.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Reduction or Termination of Commitments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower may, upon five (5)&nbsp;Business Days written
notice to Administrative Agent, permanently reduce the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment or the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment by the amount of Five Million Dollars ($5,000,000) or an integral
multiple thereof or terminate either the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment or the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment in its entirety; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;Borrower may not reduce the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment prior to the Facility&nbsp;A Maturity Date, if, after giving effect to such reduction, the
aggregate principal amount of all Facility&nbsp;A Revolving Loans then outstanding would exceed the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;Borrower may not reduce the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment prior to the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date, if, after giving effect to such
reduction, the aggregate principal
<!-- SEQ.=1,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=21,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LC2301A.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
amount of all Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loans then outstanding would exceed the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;Borrower may not terminate the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment prior to the Facility&nbsp;A Maturity Date, if, after giving effect to such termination, any
Facility&nbsp;A Revolving Loan would then remain outstanding; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;Borrower may not terminate the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment prior to the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date, if, after giving effect to such
termination, any Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan would then remain outstanding.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Unless sooner terminated pursuant to this Agreement, the Facility&nbsp;A Commitments shall terminate on the Facility&nbsp;A Maturity Date and the Facility&nbsp;B Commitments shall terminate on
the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Effect of Commitment Reductions.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;From the effective date of any reduction of the Total
Facility&nbsp;A Commitment or the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment, the Commitment Fees payable pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.07(b) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall be
computed on the basis of the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment or the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment as so reduced. Once reduced or cancelled, the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment or the Total
Facility&nbsp;B Commitment may not be increased or reinstated without the prior written consent of all applicable Lenders. Any reduction of the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment pursuant to</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.06(a)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall be applied ratably to reduce each Facility&nbsp;A Lender's Facility&nbsp;A Commitment in accordance with</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (i)&nbsp;of Subparagraph&nbsp;2.12(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Any reduction of the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment pursuant to</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.06(a)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall be applied ratably to reduce each Facility&nbsp;B Lender's Facility&nbsp;B Commitment in accordance with</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (ii)&nbsp;of Subparagraph&nbsp;2.12(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.07.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Fees.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Administrative Agent's Fee.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower shall pay to Administrative Agent, for its own account,
agent's fees and other compensation in the amounts and at the times set forth in the Administrative Agent's Fee Letter.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Commitment Fees.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower shall pay to Administrative Agent:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;For the ratable benefit of the Facility&nbsp;A Lenders as provided in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (v)&nbsp;of
Subparagraph&nbsp;2.12(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, commitment fees (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Facility&nbsp;A Commitment Fees</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") equal to the Commitment Fee Percentage of
the daily average Unused amount of the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment for the period beginning on the date of this Agreement and ending on the Facility&nbsp;A Maturity Date; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;For the ratable benefit of the Facility&nbsp;B Lenders as provided in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause (vi)&nbsp;of
Subparagraph&nbsp;2.12(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, commitment fees (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Facility&nbsp;B Commitment Fees</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") equal to the Commitment Fee Percentage of
the daily average Unused amount of the Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment for the period beginning on the date of this Agreement and ending on the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Borrower shall pay the Commitment Fees in arrears on the first day in each January, April, July&nbsp;and October&nbsp;(commencing October&nbsp;1, 1999) and on the Facility&nbsp;A Maturity Date
and the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity Date (or if the Total Facility&nbsp;A Commitment or Total Facility&nbsp;B Commitment is cancelled on a date prior to the Facility&nbsp;A
Maturity Date or the Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loan Maturity, as the case may be, on such prior date).</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.08.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Prepayments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Terms of all Prepayments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the prepayment of any Loan (whether such prepayment is an optional
prepayment under </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.08(b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, a mandatory prepayment required by</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.08(c)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or a mandatory prepayment required by any other provision of this Agreement or the other Credit Documents, including
a prepayment upon acceleration), Borrower shall pay to the
<!-- SEQ.=2,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=22,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LC2301A.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
Lender that made such Loan (i)&nbsp;all accrued interest to the date of such prepayment on the amount prepaid and (ii)&nbsp;if such prepayment is the prepayment of a LIBOR Loan or of a LIBOR
Portion on a day other than the last day of an Interest Period for such LIBOR Loan or such LIBOR Portion, all amounts payable to such Lender pursuant to</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph&nbsp;2.15.</I></FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Optional Prepayments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;At its option, Borrower may, upon one (1) Business Day notice to
Administrative Agent in the case of Base Rate Loans or Base Rate Portions or three (3)&nbsp;Business Days notice to Administrative Agent in the case of LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portions, prepay the
Loans in any Borrowing in part, in an aggregate principal amount of $2,500,000 or more, or in whole.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Mandatory Prepayments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;If, at any time, the aggregate principal amount of all Facility&nbsp;A Revolving Loans then outstanding exceeds the Total Facility A Commitment at such time,
Borrower shall immediately prepay Facility A Revolving Loans in an aggregate principal amount equal to such excess.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;If, at any time, the aggregate principal amount of all Facility&nbsp;B Revolving Loans then outstanding exceeds the Total Facility B Commitment at such time,
Borrower shall immediately prepay Facility B Revolving Loans in an aggregate principal amount equal to such excess.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Application of Term Loan Prepayments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;All Term Loan prepayments shall, to the extent possible, be
first applied to prepay Base Rate Portions and then if any funds remain, to prepay LIBOR Portions.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.09.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Other Payment Terms.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Place and Manner.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower shall make all payments due to each Lender or Administrative Agent
hereunder by payments to Administrative Agent at Administrative Agent's office located at the address specified in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph&nbsp;8.01</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, with each
payment due to a Lender to be for the account of such Lender and such Lender's Applicable Lending Office. Borrower shall make all payments hereunder in lawful money of the United States and in same
day or immediately available funds not later than 12:00 noon (San Francisco time) on the date due. Administrative Agent shall promptly disburse to each Lender each payment received by Administrative
Agent for the account of such Lender.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Date.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Whenever any payment due hereunder shall fall due on a day other than a Business Day, such
payment shall be made on the next succeeding Business Day, and such extension of time shall be included in the computation of interest or fees, as the case may be.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Late Payments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If any amount required to be paid by Borrower under this Agreement or the other
Credit Documents (including principal or interest payable on any Loan, any fee or other amount) remains unpaid after such amount is due, Borrower shall pay interest on the aggregate, outstanding
balance of such amount from the date due until such amount is paid in full at a </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per annum </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>rate equal to the Base Rate plus two percent (2.00%)</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>per annum</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, such rate to change from time to time as the Base Rate shall change.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Application of Payments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;All payments hereunder shall be applied first to unpaid fees, costs and
expenses then due and payable under this Agreement or the other Credit Documents, second to accrued interest then due and payable under this Agreement or the other Credit Documents and finally to
reduce the principal amount of outstanding Loans.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Failure to Pay Administrative Agent.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless Administrative Agent shall have received notice from
Borrower at least one (1)&nbsp;Business Day prior to the date on which any payment is due to Lenders hereunder that Borrower will not make such payment in full, Administrative Agent shall be
entitled to assume that Borrower has made or will make such payment in full to Administrative Agent on such date and Administrative Agent may, in reliance upon such assumption, cause to be paid to
<!-- SEQ.=3,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=23,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LC2301A.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
Lenders on such due date an amount equal to the amount then due such Lenders. If and to the extent Borrower shall not have so made such payment in full to Administrative Agent, each such Lender shall
repay to Administrative Agent forthwith on demand such portion of the amount distributed to such Lender as was not received from Borrower together with interest thereon, for each day from the date
such amount is distributed to such Lender until the date such Lender repays the amount required to be returned to Administrative Agent, at a </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>per
annum&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>rate equal to (i)&nbsp;the Federal Funds Rate for the first three (3)&nbsp;days and (ii)&nbsp;the rate applicable to Base Rate Loans thereafter. A
certificate of Administrative Agent submitted to any Lender with respect to any amount owing by such Lender under this</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.09(e)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall constitute </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>prima facie </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>evidence of such amount.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.10.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Loan Accounts; Notes.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Loan Accounts.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;The obligation of Borrower to repay the Loans made to it by each Lender and to pay
interest thereon at the rates provided herein shall be evidenced by an account or accounts maintained by such Lender on its books (individually, a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Loan
Account</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), except that any Lender may request that its Loans be evidenced by a note or notes pursuant to</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.10(b)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>and </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.10(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Each Lender shall record in
its Loan Accounts (i)&nbsp;the date and amount of each Loan made by such Lender, (ii)&nbsp;the interest rates applicable to each such Loan and each Portion thereof and the effective dates of all
changes thereto, (iii)&nbsp;the Interest Period for each LIBOR Loan and LIBOR Portion, (iv)&nbsp;the date and amount of each principal and interest payment on each Loan and Portion and
(v)&nbsp;such other information as such Lender may determine is necessary for the computation of principal and interest payable to it by Borrower hereunder;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that any failure by a Lender to make, or any error by any Lender in making, any such
notation shall not affect Borrower's Obligations. The Loan Accounts shall constitute </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>prima facie&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>evidence of the matters noted therein.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Revolving Loan Notes.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If any Lender so requests, such Lender's Revolving Loans shall be evidenced
by promissory notes in the form of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit E </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(individually, a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Revolving Loan Note</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") which notes shall
be (i) payable to the order of such Lender, (ii)&nbsp;in the amount of such Lender's Facility A Commitment and Facility B Commitment, (iii)&nbsp;dated the Closing Date and (iv)&nbsp;otherwise
appropriately completed. Borrower authorizes each Lender to record on the schedule annexed to such Lender's applicable Revolving Loan Note the date and amount of each applicable Revolving Loan made by
such Lender and of each payment or prepayment of principal thereon made by Borrower, and agrees that all such notations shall constitute </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>prima
facie&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>evidence of the matters noted; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that any
failure
by a Lender to make, or any error by any Lender in making, any such notation shall not affect Borrower's Obligations. Borrower further authorizes each Lender to attach to and make a part of such
Lender's Revolving Loan Notes continuations of the schedule attached thereto as necessary.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Term Loan Notes.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If any Lender so requests, such Lender's Facility B Term Loan shall be evidenced
by a promissory note in the form of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit F </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(individually, a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Term Loan Note</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") which note shall be (i)
payable to the order of such Lender, (ii)&nbsp;in the amount of such Lender's Facility B Term Loan, (iii)&nbsp;dated the Facility B Revolving Loan Maturity Date and (iv)&nbsp;otherwise
appropriately completed.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.11.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Loan Funding.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lender Funding and Disbursement to Borrower.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Each Lender shall, before 12:00 noon (San Francisco
time) on the date of each Borrowing, make available to Administrative Agent at Administrative Agent's office specified in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 8.01</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, in same day or
immediately available funds, such Lender's applicable Proportionate Share of such Borrowing. After Administrative Agent's receipt of such funds and upon satisfaction of the applicable conditions set
forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section III</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, Administrative Agent shall promptly disburse such funds to Borrower in same day or immediately available funds. Administrative
Agent shall disburse the proceeds of each Revolving Loan Borrowing by disbursement
<!-- SEQ.=4,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=24,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LC2301A.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
to the account or accounts specified in the applicable Notice of Borrowing. The proceeds of the Facility B Term Loan Borrowing shall be applied to repay the Facility B Revolving Loans and shall be
disbursed directly to Facility B Lenders.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lender Failure to Fund.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless Administrative Agent shall have received notice from a Lender prior
to the date of any Borrowing that such Lender will not make available to Administrative Agent such Lender's applicable Proportionate Share of such Borrowing, Administrative Agent shall be entitled to
assume that such Lender has made or will make such portion available to Administrative Agent on the date of such Borrowing in accordance with </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
2.11(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, and Administrative Agent may on such date, in reliance upon such assumption, disburse or otherwise credit to Borrower a corresponding amount. If any Lender does not
make the amount of its applicable Proportionate Share of any Borrowing available to Administrative Agent on or prior to the date of such Borrowing, such Lender shall pay to Administrative Agent, on
demand, interest which shall accrue on such amount from the date of such Borrowing until such amount is paid to Administrative Agent at rates equal to (i)&nbsp;the daily Federal Funds Rate during
the period from the date of such Borrowing through the third Business Day thereafter and (ii)&nbsp;the rate applicable to Base Rate Loans thereafter. A certificate of Administrative Agent submitted
to any Lender with respect to any amount owing by such Lender under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph&nbsp;2.11(b) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall constitute </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>prima
facie </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>evidence of such amount. If the amount of any Lender's applicable Proportionate Share of any Borrowing is not paid to Administrative Agent by such Lender within three
(3)&nbsp;Business Days after the date of such Borrowing, Borrower shall repay such amount to Administrative Agent, on demand, together with interest thereon, for each day from the date such amount
was disbursed to Borrower until the date such amount is repaid to Administrative Agent, at the interest rate applicable at the time to the Loans comprising such Borrowing.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lenders' Obligations Several.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;The failure of any Lender to make the Loan to be made by it as part
of any Borrowing shall not relieve any other Lender of its obligation hereunder to make its Loan as part of such Borrowing, but no Lender shall be obligated in any way to make any Loan which another
Lender has failed or refused to make or otherwise be in any way responsible for the failure or refusal of any other Lender to make any Loan required to be made by such other Lender on the date of any
Borrowing.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.12.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Pro Rata Treatment.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrowings, Commitment Reductions, Etc.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as otherwise provided herein:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;Each Borrowing under Facility A and reduction of the Total Facility A Commitment shall be made or shared among Facility A Lenders </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>pro
rata&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>according to their respective Facility A Proportionate Shares;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;Each Borrowing under Facility B and reduction of the Total Facility B Commitment shall be made or shared among Facility B Lenders </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>pro
rata&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>according to their respective Facility B Proportionate Shares;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;Each payment of principal on Loans in any Borrowing shall be shared among Lenders which made or funded the Loans in such Borrowing </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>pro
rata&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>according to the respective unpaid principal amounts of such Loans then owed to such Lenders;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;Each payment of interest on Loans in any Borrowing shall be shared among Lenders which made or funded the Loans in such Borrowing </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>pro
rata&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>according to (A)&nbsp;the respective unpaid principal amounts of such Loans so made or funded by such Lenders and (B)&nbsp;the dates on which such
Lenders so made or funded such Loans;
<!-- SEQ.=5,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=25,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LC2301A.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(v)&nbsp;Each payment of Facility A Commitment Fees shall be shared among Facility A Lenders (except for Defaulting Lenders) </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>pro
rata&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>according to (A)&nbsp;their respective Facility A Proportionate Shares and (B)&nbsp;in the case of each Lender which becomes a Facility A Lender
hereunder after the date hereof, the date upon which such Lender so became a Facility A Lender;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(vi)&nbsp;Each payment of Facility B Commitment Fees shall be shared among Facility B Lenders (except for Defaulting Lenders) </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>pro rata</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>according to (A)&nbsp;their respective
Facility B Proportionate Shares and (B)&nbsp;in the case of each Lender which becomes a Facility Lender hereunder after the date
hereof, the date upon which such Lender so became a Facility B Lender;</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(vii)&nbsp;Each payment of interest (other than interest on Loans) shall be shared among Lenders and Administrative Agent owed the amount upon which such interest accrues</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>pro rata </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>according to (A)&nbsp;the respective amounts so owed such Lenders and Administrative Agent and (B)&nbsp;the dates on which such amounts
became owing to such Lenders and Administrative Agent; and</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(viii)&nbsp;All other payments under this Agreement and the other Credit Documents shall be for the benefit of the Person or Persons specified.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Sharing of Payments, Etc.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If any Lender shall obtain any payment (whether voluntary, involuntary,
through the exercise of any right of setoff, or otherwise) on account of Loans owed to it in excess of its ratable share of payments on account of such Loans obtained by all Lenders entitled to such
payments, such Lender shall forthwith purchase from the other Lenders such participations in the Loans as shall be necessary to cause such purchasing Lender to share the excess payment ratably with
each of them; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that if all or any portion of such excess payment is thereafter
recovered from such purchasing Lender, such purchase shall be rescinded and each other Lender shall repay to the purchasing Lender the purchase price to the extent of such recovery together with an
amount equal to such other Lender's ratable share (according to the proportion of (i)&nbsp;the amount of such other Lender's required repayment to (ii)&nbsp;the total amount so recovered from the
purchasing Lender) of any interest or other amount paid or payable by the purchasing Lender in respect of the total amount so recovered. Borrower agrees that any Lender so purchasing a participation
from another Lender pursuant to this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.12(b) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>may, to the fullest extent permitted by law, exercise all its rights of payment
(including the right of setoff) with respect to such participation as fully as if such Lender were the direct creditor of Borrower in the amount of such participation.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.13.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Change of Circumstances.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Inability to Determine Rates.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If, on or before the first day of any Interest Period for any LIBOR
Loan or LIBOR Portion, (i)&nbsp;any Lender shall advise Administrative Agent that the LIBO Rate for such Interest Period cannot be adequately and reasonably determined due to the unavailability of
funds in or other circumstances affecting the London interbank market or (ii)&nbsp;Majority Lenders shall advise Administrative Agent that the rate of interest for such Loan or Portion, as the case
may be, does not adequately and fairly reflect the cost to such Lenders of making or maintaining such LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion, Administrative Agent shall immediately give notice of such condition
to Borrower and the other Lenders. After the giving of any such notice and until Administrative Agent shall otherwise notify Borrower that the circumstances giving rise to such condition no longer
exist, Borrower's right to request the making of, conversion to or a new Interest Period for LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portions shall be suspended. Any LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portions outstanding at the
commencement of any such suspension shall be converted at the end of the then current Interest Period for such LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portions into Base Rate Loans or Base Rate Portions, as the case may
be, unless such suspension has then ended.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Illegality.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If, after the date of this Agreement, the adoption of any Governmental Rule, any change
in any Governmental Rule&nbsp;or the application or requirements thereof (whether such change occurs in accordance with the terms of such Governmental Rule&nbsp;as enacted, as a result of
amendment
<!-- SEQ.=6,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=26,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LC2301A.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
or otherwise), any change in the interpretation or administration of any Governmental Rule&nbsp;by any Governmental Authority, or compliance by any Lender with any request or directive (whether or
not having the force of law) of any Governmental Authority (a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Change of Law</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") shall make it unlawful or impossible for any Lender to make or maintain
any LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion, such Lender shall immediately notify Administrative Agent and Borrower of such Change of Law. Upon receipt of such notice, (i)&nbsp;Borrower's right to request the
making of, conversion to or a new Interest Period for LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portions shall be terminated, and Borrower shall, at the request of such Lender, (A)&nbsp;repay any outstanding LIBOR Loans
or convert any outstanding LIBOR Portions into Base Rate Loans at the end of the current Interest Period for such LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portions or (B) immediately repay or convert any such LIBOR Loans
or LIBOR Portions if such Lender shall notify Borrower that such Lender may not lawfully continue to fund and maintain such LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portions. Any conversion or prepayment of LIBOR Loans
or LIBOR Portions made pursuant to the preceding sentence prior to the last day of an Interest Period for such LIBOR Loans or LIBOR Portions shall be deemed a prepayment thereof for purposes of</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 2.15</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. After any Lender notifies Administrative Agent and Borrower of such a Change of Law and until such Lender notifies Administrative Agent
and Borrower that it is no longer unlawful or impossible for such Lender to make or maintain a LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion, all Revolving Loans and all Portions of the Facility B Term Loan of such
Lender shall be Base Rate Loans and Base Rate Portions, respectively.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Increased Costs.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If, after the date of this Agreement, any Change of Law:</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;Shall subject any Lender to any tax, duty or other charge with respect to any LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion, or shall change the basis of taxation of payments by
Borrower to any Lender on such a LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion or in respect to such a LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion under this Agreement (except for changes in the rate of taxation on the overall net
income of any Lender imposed by its jurisdiction of incorporation or the jurisdiction in which its principal executive office is located); or</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;Shall impose, modify or hold applicable any reserve (excluding any Reserve Requirement or other reserve to the extent included in the calculation of the LIBO Rate
for any Loans or Portions), special deposit or similar requirement against assets held by, deposits or other liabilities in or for the account of, advances or loans by, or any other acquisition of
funds by any Lender for any LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion; or</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;Shall impose on any Lender any other condition related to any LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion or such Lender's Commitments;</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
And the effect of any of the foregoing is to increase the cost to such Lender of making, renewing, or maintaining any such LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion or its Commitments or to reduce any amount
receivable by such Lender hereunder; then Borrower shall from time to time, within five (5)&nbsp;Business Days after demand by such Lender, pay to such Lender additional amounts sufficient to
reimburse such Lender for such increased costs or to compensate such Lender for such reduced amounts; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that Borrower shall have no obligation to make any payment to any demanding party under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
2.13(c)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>on account of any such increased costs or reduced amounts unless Borrower receives notice of such increased costs or reduced amounts from the demanding
party within six (6) months after they are incurred or realized. A certificate setting forth in reasonable detail the amount of such increased costs or reduced amounts, submitted by such Lender to
Borrower shall constitute </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>prima facie </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>evidence of such costs or amounts. The obligations of Borrower under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
2.13(c)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall survive the payment and performance of the Obligations and the termination of this Agreement.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Capital Requirements.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If, after the date of this Agreement, any Lender determines that
(i)&nbsp;any Change of Law affects the amount of capital required or expected to be maintained by such
<!-- SEQ.=7,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=27,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LC2301A.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
Lender or any Person controlling such Lender (a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Capital Adequacy Requirement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") and (ii)&nbsp;the amount of capital maintained by such Lender or such
Person which is attributable to or based upon the Loans, the Commitments or this Agreement must be increased as a result of such Capital Adequacy Requirement (taking into account such Lender's or such
Person's policies with respect to capital adequacy), Borrower shall pay to such Lender or such Person, within five (5)&nbsp;Business Days after demand of such Lender, such amounts as such Lender or
such Person shall determine are necessary to compensate such Lender or such Person for the increased costs to such Lender or such Person of such increased capital;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that Borrower shall have no obligation to make any payment to any demanding party
under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(d) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>on account of any such increased costs unless Borrower receives notice of such increased costs from the demanding party
within six (6) months after they are incurred or realized. A certificate setting forth in reasonable detail the amount of such increased costs, submitted by any Lender to Borrower shall constitute</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>prima facie </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>evidence of such costs. The obligations of Borrower under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(d) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall
survive the payment and performance of the Obligations and the termination of this Agreement.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Mitigation.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Any Lender which becomes aware of (i)&nbsp;any Change of Law which will make it
unlawful or impossible for such Lender to make or maintain any LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion or (ii)&nbsp;any Change of Law or other event or condition which will obligate Borrower to pay any amount
pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(c) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(d) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall notify Borrower and Administrative Agent
thereof as promptly as practical. If any Lender has given notice of any such Change of Law or other event or condition and thereafter becomes aware that such Change of Law or other event or condition
has ceased to exist, such Lender shall notify Borrower and Administrative Agent thereof as promptly as practical. Each Lender affected by any Change of Law which makes it unlawful or impossible for
such Lender to make or maintain any LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion or to which Borrower is obligated to
pay any amount pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(c)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(d) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall use reasonable
commercial efforts (including changing the jurisdiction of its Applicable Lending Office) to avoid the effect of such Change of Law or to avoid or materially reduce any amounts which Borrower is
obligated to pay pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(c) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(d) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>if, in the reasonable opinion
of such Lender, such efforts would not be disadvantageous to such Lender or contrary to such Lender's normal banking practices.</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.14.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Taxes on Payments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Payments Free of Taxes.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;All payments made by Borrower under this Agreement and the other Credit
Documents shall be made free and clear of, and without deduction or withholding for or on account of, any present or future income, stamp, documentary or other taxes, any duties, or any other levies,
imposts, charges, fees, deductions or withholdings, now or hereafter imposed, levied, collected, withheld or assessed by any Governmental Authority (except net income taxes and franchise taxes in lieu
of net income taxes imposed on Administrative Agent or any Lender by its jurisdiction of incorporation or the jurisdiction in which its Applicable Lending Office is located) (all such non-excluded
taxes, duties, levies, imposts, charges, fees, deductions and withholdings being hereinafter called "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Taxes</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). If any Taxes are required to be withheld
from any amounts payable to Administrative Agent or any Lender hereunder or under the other Credit Documents, the amounts so payable to Administrative Agent or such Lender shall be increased to the
extent necessary to yield to Administrative Agent or such Lender (after payment of all Taxes) interest or any such other amounts payable hereunder at the rates or in the amounts specified in this
Agreement and the other Credit Documents. Whenever any Taxes are payable by Borrower, as promptly as possible thereafter, Borrower shall send to Administrative Agent for its own account or for the
account of such Lender, as the case may be, a certified copy of an original official receipt received by Borrower showing payment thereof. If Borrower fails to pay any Taxes when due to the
appropriate taxing authority or fails to remit to Administrative Agent the required receipts or other required documentary evidence, Borrower shall indemnify Administrative Agent and Lenders for any
taxes, interest or penalties that may become
<!-- SEQ.=8,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=28,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LC2301A.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
payable by Administrative Agent or any Lender as a result of any such failure. The obligations of Borrower under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.14(a) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall survive
the payment and performance of the Obligations and the termination of this Agreement.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Withholding Exemption Certificates.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;On or prior to the date of the initial Borrowing or, if such
date does not occur within thirty (30) days after the date of this Agreement, by the end of such 30-day period, each Lender which is not organized under the laws of the United States of America or a
state thereof shall deliver to Borrower and Administrative Agent two duly completed copies of United States Internal Revenue Service Form 1001 or 4224 (or successor applicable form), as the case may
be, certifying in each case that such Lender is entitled to receive payments under this Agreement without deduction or withholding or with reduced deduction or withholding of any United States federal
income taxes. Each such Lender further agrees (i)&nbsp;promptly to notify Borrower and Administrative Agent of any change of circumstances (including any change in any treaty, law or regulation)
which would prevent such Lender from receiving payments hereunder without any deduction or withholding or with reduced deduction or withholding of such taxes as indicated on the most recent such
certificate or other form previously delivered by such Lender and (ii)&nbsp;if such Lender has not so notified Borrower and Administrative Agent of any change of circumstances which would prevent
such Lender from receiving payments hereunder without any deduction or withholding or with reduced deduction or withholding of taxes as indicated on the most recent such certificate or other form
previously delivered by such Lender, then on or before the date that any certificate or other form delivered by such Lender under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph
2.14(b)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>expires or becomes obsolete or after the occurrence of any event requiring a change in the most recent such certificate or form previously delivered by
such Lender, to
deliver to Borrower and Administrative Agent a new certificate or form, certifying that such Lender is entitled to receive payments under this Agreement without deduction or withholding or with
reduced deduction or withholding of such taxes. If any Lender fails to provide to Borrower or Administrative Agent pursuant to this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.14(b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(or, in the case of an Assignee Lender,
</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 8.05(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>) any certificates or other evidence required by such provision to
establish that such Lender is, at the time it becomes a Lender hereunder, entitled to receive payments under this Agreement without deduction or withholding or with reduced deduction or withholding of
any United States federal income taxes, such Lender shall not be entitled to any indemnification under </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.14(a) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>for any Taxes imposed on
such Lender primarily as a result of such failure.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Mitigation.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If Administrative Agent or any Lender claims any additional amounts to be payable to it
pursuant to this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 2.14</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, such Person shall use reasonable commercial efforts to file any certificate or document requested in writing by
Borrower (including copies of Internal Revenue Service Form 1001 (or successor forms) reflecting a reduced rate of withholding or to change the jurisdiction of its Applicable Lending Office if the
making of such a filing or such change in the jurisdiction of its Applicable Lending Office would avoid the need for or materially reduce the amount of any such additional amounts which may thereafter
accrue and if, in the reasonable opinion of such Person, in the case of a change in the jurisdiction of its Applicable Lending Office, such change would not be disadvantageous to such Person or
contrary to such Person's normal banking practices.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Tax Returns.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Nothing contained in this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph
2.14&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall require Administrative Agent or any Lender to make available any of its tax returns (or any other information relating to its taxes which it deems to
be confidential).</FONT></P>
</UL>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.15.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Funding Loss Indemnification.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If Borrower shall (a)&nbsp;repay, prepay or convert any LIBOR
Loan or LIBOR Portion on any day other than the last day of an Interest Period therefor (whether a scheduled payment, an optional prepayment or conversion, a mandatory prepayment or conversion, a
payment upon acceleration or otherwise), (b)&nbsp;fail to borrow any LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion for which a Notice of Borrowing has been delivered to Administrative Agent (whether as a result of
the failure to
<!-- SEQ.=9,EFW="9924519",CP="ADOBE SYSTEMS INCORPORATED",DN="5",FOLIO=29,FILE='DISK040:[99PAL1.99PAL2301]LC2301A.;12',USER='BHUGHES',CD='15-OCT-1999;08:59' -->
satisfy any applicable conditions or otherwise) or (c)&nbsp;fail to convert any Portion of the Facility B Term Loan Borrowing into a LIBOR Portion in accordance with a Notice of Term Loan Conversion
delivered to Administrative Agent (whether as a result of the failure to satisfy any applicable conditions or otherwise), Borrower shall, within five (5)&nbsp;Business Days after demand by any
Lender, reimburse such Lender for and hold such Lender harmless from all costs and losses incurred by such Lender as a result of such repayment, prepayment, conversion or failure;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that Borrower shall have no obligation to make any payment to any demanding party
under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 2.15 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>on account of any such costs or losses unless Borrower receives notice of such costs or losses from the demanding party within
six (6)&nbsp;months after they are incurred or realized. Borrower understands that such costs and losses may include, without limitation, losses incurred by a Lender as a result of funding and other
contracts entered into by such Lender to fund a LIBOR Loan or LIBOR Portion. Each Lender demanding payment under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 2.15 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall deliver to
Borrower, with a copy to Administrative Agent, a certificate setting forth the amount of costs and losses for which demand is made, which certificate shall set forth in reasonable detail the
calculation of the amount demanded. Such a certificate so delivered to Borrower shall constitute </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>prima facie </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>evidence of such costs and losses. The
obligations of Borrower under this </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Paragraph 2.15 </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall survive the payment and performance of the Obligations and the termination of this Agreement.</FONT></P>
<P><FONT SIZE=2>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.16.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Replacement of Lenders.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If any Lender shall (a)&nbsp;become a Defaulting Lender more than one
(1)&nbsp;time in a period of twelve (12) consecutive months, (b)&nbsp;continue as a Defaulting Lender for more than five (5)&nbsp;Business Days at any time, (c)&nbsp;suspend its obligation to
make or maintain LIBOR Loans or LIBOR
Portions pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(b) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>for a reason which is not applicable to any other Lender or (d)&nbsp;demand any payment under</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 2.13(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>2.13(d) </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>2.14(a)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>for a reason which is not applicable to any other Lender, then Administrative Agent may, with the written consent of Borrower, or
shall, upon the written request of Borrower, replace such Lender (the "affected Lender"), or cause such affected Lender to be replaced with another lender (the "replacement Lender") satisfying the
requirements of an Assignee Lender, by having the affected Lender sell and assign all of its rights and obligations under this Agreement and the other Credit Documents to the replacement Lender
pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Subparagraph 8.05(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>; </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,
